111b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa blo dben pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros dam par dgongs pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyis brgyan pa la phyag 'tshalo// 
111b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa skyob pa'i dbang po la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes blo gros la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan ri rab la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin
111b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dbyangs brnyan pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa g.yul 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin
111b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa zla ba ston pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin dgashegs pa yon tan phung po rab tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal// / de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi stobs la phyag 'tshal lo// 
111b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa the tsom rnam par zhi ba la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po dul
111b6(mdo sde): ba la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros mchog la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i dbang po la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi
111b7(mdo sde): 'od la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsir dgongs pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa
111b8(mdo sde): gtsug tor dgyed pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa phun sum grags pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gsal ba la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs
112a1(mdo sde): brgyan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa mthar yas pa la phyag
112a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'od la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub rgyal po phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa med pa'i blo la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin
112a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa kun gyi spyan la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshim par mdzad pa'i yan lag la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs can la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin
112a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa shes rab kyi 'od la phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'od la phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa chos bzhin bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 
112a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa phan par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs pa 'byin pa la phyaga' tshalo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su
112a6(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag gsungaso// rgyal ba rnams kyis mtshan 'di thos nas ni// bag yod rim gro skyed cing rig par bya// phun sum 'di la ma dang spyod na ni// ngan song sdug bsngal phyir
112a7(mdo sde): yang myong nga re/ rims bzhin tshul khrims la ni rten nas su// thos la dang cing rab tu dben par ldan// zab mo bzod pa yongs su bskang na ni// des ni 'jig rten mgon po 'di
112a8(mdo sde): kun mthong // las kyi 'bras bu rnam smin mi shes te/ bskal pa bye bar sdig pa'i las byas pas// rgyal ba rnams kyi mtshan 'di 'dzin na ni// de kun byang nas sangs rgyas
112b1(mdo sde): nyid 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi mtshan lnga stong bzhi brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa rdzogs s+ho/ glegs bam bcwa lnga tsam la btugs te/ mtshan 'dra men dang gong 'og mi dra/ 
112b2(mdo sde): ba mang du snang / da dung brgyad brgya bdun cu tsam ma rnyed pas/ 'di nyid glegs bam rnams nas mtshan rnam dag nges pa can rnyed na bzhugs par 'tshal/ 
112b3(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya lang ka a ba ta ra ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub
112b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad padag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan dus lang ka'i grong rdal na/ rgya mtsho rim la ya rtse mo ran
112b5(mdo sde): po che'i rigs dang // me tog sna chog kyi brgyan pa la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus
112b6(mdo sde): pa ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / mngon par shes pa du mas rnam par rol pa/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros chen po la sogs pa dag/ sangs rgyas thams cad
112b7(mdo sde): kyi phyag gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba/ bdag gi sems snang ba'i spyod yul yongs su shes pa'i don la mkhas pa/ sems can gyi sems sna tshogs dang / gzugs dang / tshul dang
112b8(mdo sde): 'dul ba rnam pa tha dad pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ chos lnga dang / rang bzhin dang / rnam par shes pa dang / bdag med pa gnyis khong du chud par rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag gis
113a1(mdo sde): tshogs chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ yang de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho'i klu'i rgyal po'i gnas nas zhag bdun lon te byung nas/ brgya byin dang
113a2(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu mo bye ba du mas bsu ba dang // lang ka'i rim la ya la gzigs te/ lang ka'i grong rdal gyi ma la ya'i rtse mo 'dir/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
113a3(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / 'phags pa so so rang gi rig pa'i ye shes rtog ge'i lta ba mu stegs can dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
113a4(mdo sde): dang / 'phags pa'i yul ma yin pa de dag gis bsgom sa pa'i chos bstan te/ ngas kyang 'di nyid du gno da sbyin gyi bdag po 'bod 'grogs kyi phyir de nyid bsnyad cing
113a5(mdo sde): chos bstan to snyam nas 'dzum pa mdzum pa mdzad do// de nas gnod sbyin gyi bdag po 'bod 'grogs de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis/ bcom
113a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das rgya mtsho'i klu'i rgyal po'i gnas nas byung ste/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / klu'i bu mo brgya stong du mas bskor cing mdun du bang ra nas/ rgya mtsho'i rlabs la
113a7(mdo sde): gzigs te/ kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i rgya mtsho la 'jug pa rnam par shes pa yul gyi rlung gis bskyod cing / de dag gi sems 'byung bar gzigs te/ ched du brjod pa che du brjod
113a8(mdo sde): pa mdzad do// zhes thos nas/ bdag song la bcom ldan 'das la gsol/ ba btab ste lang kar gshegs par bya'o// des na bdag dang lha dang mi rnams la yun ring po'i don
113b1(mdo sde): dang / ban pa dang / bde bar 'gyu ro snyam ste/ de na gnod sbyin gyi bdag po 'bong 'grogs 'khor dang bcas pa me tog gi gzhal med khang du bzhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song
113b2(mdo sde): ste phyin pa dang / 'khor dang bcas te gzhal med khang nas babs nas rnga dang sil snyan rnams rab tu bsgrags te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ pi bang gi khog pa in
113b3(mdo sde): tra ni la la bai DUr+ya dang / mu sa ras spras pa/ gos ngur ka pri yang ku dra ba rin tang mang bas mtshan du sbyangs te/ 'khor rnams rab tu dga' bar byas nas/ klu'i dbyangs sha rdza dang
113b4(mdo sde): ri sha ba dang / 'ga' na d+ha dang / d+he bA ta dang / da ni sha ta dang / mang d+ha ma dang / ke sha ka dang / klu'i dbyangs mang por sbyar ba la sogs pa dang ldan zhing rgyud
113b5(mdo sde): rjes su mthun pa dang / pi bang gi nang du chud par byas te/ tshig su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis glu blangs pa/ sems kyi rang bzhin tshul nyid chos kyi gter// bdag med lha dang
113b6(mdo sde): rnam bral dri ma med// so so rang rig ye shes ston pa yi// chos tshul mgon po 'dir yang bshad du gsol// dge ba'i chos kyis yang dag bstsags pa'i sku// bde gshegs/ 
113b7(mdo sde): 'phrul pas sprul pa ston pa ste// so so rang rig rtog pa'i chos bgyis pa// thub pa deng ni lang kar gshegs pa'i dus// lang ka 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal ba dang // de'i sras rnams gzugs/ 
113b8(mdo sde): mnga'achang bar bzhugs// mgon po 'dir ni chos rab gshang du gsol// gzugs mang ldan pa'i gnod sbyin kun kyang nyan// da ltar lang ka'i bdag po 'bod 'grogs kyis/ To ta ka'i dru
114a1(mdo sde): duglu blangs nas// yang tshig su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis glu blangs pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni dgung bdun te// chu srin gnas kyi rgya mtsho yi// rgya mtsho'i dbang po gnas
114a2(mdo sde): nas ni/ slad du byung ste 'gram na bzhugs// sangs rgyas bzhugs ma thag tu yang // ne co sar nas brgyan pa yi// gnod sbyin rnam pa mang po dang // 'bod 'grogs lha mo
114a3(mdo sde): lhan cig tu// mgon po gang na bzhugs pa yi// lam der 'phrul gyis song nas ni// me tog bzhon las babs nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs la mchod phyag 'tshal// rgyal ba
114a4(mdo sde): dbang pos byin brlabs nas// de la mngon par ming bar dad pa// bdag ni 'bod 'grogs mgrin bcu ste/  srin po'i dbang po 'dir mchis// grong rdal 'din su gnas
114a5(mdo sde): dang bdag gi lang ka rje su zung // rdzogs pa'i sa sa rgyas snga mas kyang // so so rang rig spyod yul na/ rtse mo rin chen brgyan pa yi// grong rdal dbus su rab tu ba
114a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de nyid kyi// rtse mo rin chen brgyan pa la// rgyal ba'i sras kyis yongs bskor cing // rdul med chos ni gshadu gsol// gang rnams lang kar gnas pa dang / 
114a7(mdo sde): bdag cag de rang nyan par 'tshal// bshad ba'i tshul las rnam grol ba// so so rang rig spyod yul te// lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo sde ni// sangs rgyas snga mas gsungs pa'o// rgyal
114a8(mdo sde): pa'i sras kyis yongs bskor cing // sngon gyi sangs rgyas dag gis kyang // mdo sde 'dzin bshad par dran// bcom ldan gyis kyang bshadugasal// ma 'ongs dus na 'byung ba yi/ sangs rgyas
114b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas sras dag kyang // lha yi tshul te 'di nyid ni// rtse mo rin chen brgyan pa la// gnod sbyin rnams la thugs brtse phyir// dran pa sems ni ston par 'gyur// lha'i lang ka'i grong brdal
114b2(mdo sde): 'di// mdangs dga' rin chen sna tshogs dang // thel sdings rdo stengs dga' ba dang // rin chen dra ba'i bla res brgyan// rnal 'byor nyes dang rnam bral ba// so so rang rig sems pa yi// bcom ldan
114b3(mdo sde): 'di ni gnod sbyin dag/ sangs rgyas snga mas mdzad srung ba// theg chen tshul la dad pa yi// mngon par zhen cing gzhan 'jung ba// gnod sbyin mo dang gnod sbyin bu// theg chen rtogs
114b4(mdo sde): par 'tshal ba mchis// lang ka ma la ya'i rir// sto/ dan pa sangs rgyas gshegasu gsol// bum pa rnal sogs pa'i rnams// srin po grong rdal gnas pa dag
114b5(mdo sde): theg pa che la rtog pa rnams// so so rang rig nyan par 'cha/ la// sangs rgyas rnams la bgyi ba bgyis// de ltar na yang shin tu bgyid// bdag la rje su thugs brtse'i phyir// 
114b6(mdo sde): lang kar sras dang bcas te gshegs// khyim dang lha mo tshogs rnams dang // se mo do yang sna tshogs dang // mdangs dga' a sho ka yi tshal// thub pa chen po bzhi su gsol// bdag
114b7(mdo sde): ni rgyal sras de dag dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' bzhin bgyid// bdag gis mi dbul gcig ma mchis// thub pa chen po thugs brtser dgongs// de'i tshig de gnas pa dang // 
114b8(mdo sde): srid gsum dbang pos gsungs pa ni// gnod sbyin dbang po 'das pa yi// mgon pos rin chen ri bo la// so so rang rig chos rnams bstan// khyod nyid la yang thugs brtser dgongs
115a1(mdo sde): rin chen rnam brgyang rabol// ma 'ongs rnams kyang gsungs par 'gyur// 'dzin rnal 'byor ldan padag/ mthong ba ba chos la spyod pa gnas// ngadang sras
115a2(mdo sde): gang gis kyang // gnod sbyin dbang po brtser dgongs rigs// bcom ldan nang nas mi gsung bar// zhi ba'i blo yis rnam par bzhugs// 'bod 'grogs kyis ni phul ba yi// me tog
115a3(mdo sde): bzhon par bzhugs par gyur// de nyid du ni 'bod 'grogs dang // 'jigs med rgyal sras gzhan yang ste// lha mo gzhang gad rol mo yis// rab tu mchod cing grong du gshegs// 
115a4(mdo sde): dga' ba'i grong rdal der gshegs nas// mchod pa rab tu yang skyeso// 'bod 'grogs la sogs gnod sbyin gyi// sde dang gnod sbyin mos kyang mchod// gnod sbyin
115a5(mdo sde): bu mo gnod sbyin bus// rin po che yi drabs mchod // 'bod 'grogs kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyis// rin chen brgyan pa'i sa mo // rgyal ba'i sras dang rgyal ba yi/ 
115a6(mdo sde): stod kyi yan lag rnams la btags// bcom ldan rgyal sras mkhas bcas pa// mchod pa phul ba bzhes nas ni// so so rang gi spyod yul gyis// chos ni rnam par brtan par mdzad// 
115a7(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dbang po 'bod 'grogs kyis// smra ba rnams kyi mchog mchod de// blo gros chen po rab mchod cing // gsol pa yang dang yang 'debs pa// khyod ni sangs rgyas thams cad la/ 
115a8(mdo sde): rang rig spyod yul 'dri ba yin// 'drin bdag dang gnod sbyin dang // rgyal ba'i sras rnams nyan pa mchis// khyod la rgyal sras mkhas pa dang // gnod sbyin rnams kyang gsol ba 'des
115b1(mdo sde): smra ba'i nang na sgra chen khyod// rnal 'byor can gyi'ang rnal 'byor zhugs// khyod la gus par gsol 'debs kyis// 'jigs pa med par tshul dris shig/ rang rgyal nyan thos rnams dang ni
115b2(mdo sde): mu stegs nyes las rnam par grol// so so rang rig chos nyid gtsang // sangs rgyas sa ni thob byed pa'o// rtse mo rin chen brgyan pa dang // gzhan yang lha rdzas rnams kyi ni// rin chen
115b3(mdo sde): bye bas brgyan pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis der sprul te// mgon pos ri bo re re la// nyid kyi sku ni rab tu bstan// 'bod 'grogs gnod sbyin de dag na// re re la ni rnam par gnas/ 
115b4(mdo sde): thams cad 'khor ni mabri bar// re ren yang shin tu snang // de na zhing rnams thams cad dang // gang la dang den 'dren pa dang // den srin po'i dbang po rnams// gang dag
115b5(mdo sde): lang kar gnas pa'ang snang // de dang 'gran pa'i lang ka dang // a sho ka'i tshal gzhan dang // nags chu la bzang po de dag kyang // rgyal ba yis ni mngon par sprul// maH
115b6(mdo sde): por rnams re re la// blo gros chen pos bskul ba dang // so so rang rig brjod pa yi// chos ni gnod sbyin rnams la brtan// stong phrag brgya pa'i mdo sde dag/ ri bo la ni ma lus bshad
115b7(mdo sde): ston pa dang ni rgyal sras rnams// de nyid du yang mi snang gyur// gnod sbyin 'bod 'grogs bdag gis lus// khyim na gnas par mthong ba dang // bsam pa 'di go gcig bzhin skam
115b8(mdo sde): gang gis bshad de su yis thos// ci zhig mthong gi gang gis mthong // grong khyer de dag gang du song // sangs rgyas de dag ning de rnams// rin chen nags bzang dag re// 'di ni sku
116a1(mdo sde): ma'am rmi lam rol// dri za'i grong khyer zhes bsgrags pa'am// rab rib yin nam smig rgyu'am// rmi lam mo sham bu byung ngam// bdag gis 'dir ni gang mthong
116a2(mdo sde): pab 'gal me bskor tam du ba 'am// 'on te sems kyi spyod yul la// chos rnams kyi ni chos nyid dam// blta ba med cing blta ba'ang med// smra med smra bar bya med na// rang gis rtogs
116a3(mdo sde): par myos pa yi// byis pa rnams kyis mi sheso// gzhan du rnam par rtog pa 'di// sangs rgyas dang ni chos ltar gnas// ji ltar mthong bzhin su ltag/ de dag 'dren pa mi mthong
116a4(mdo sde): rnam par rtog pa mi 'jug cing // gang tshe sangs rgyas mi mthong la/ 'jug med sangs rgyas yin par ni// gal te mthong na de sangs rgyas// lang ka'i bdag po gnas shin tu
116a5(mdo sde): gyur pa dang rang gi sems snang ba tsam du khong du chud pa/ rab tu rtog ma thag tu rnam par rtogs pa'i rgyu ba la gnas pa sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul ba// gtsug lag khang
116a6(mdo sde): thams cad la mkhas pa'i blo// de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba// gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa// bdag gi blo rnam par dpyod pa la mkhas pa/ tog ge ba'i lta ba dang bral bar lta ba// 
116a7(mdo sde): gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa// rnal 'byor chen po'i rnal 'byor can// gzugs sna tshogs 'chang ba chen po thabs la mkhas pa/ khong du chud par rtogs par gong nas gong dus thams cad
116a8(mdo sde): kyi rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa// sems dang yid dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dben pa la dga' ba/ rgyud gsum chad par lta ba rgyu mu stegs thams cad
116b1(mdo sde): dang bral ba thor gyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nang pa sangs rgyas kyis lanang du rnams par zhugs pa la gnas shing sangs rgyas kyi thos rnamapa' dang / nang nas smrathos pa lang / 'i bdag pa'os
116b2(mdo sde): sa legs// yang lang ka'i bdag po khyod ni legs// ji ltar slob pa de ltar rnal 'byor can rnams kyis brdab bo// ji ltar khyod kyis mthong ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / 
116b3(mdo sde): rnams lwa bar bya'o// rnam pa gzhan du bltas na chang pal gnas par 'gyuraro// khyod kyi sems dang yid dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang bral zhing nang du spyod pas/ chos thams cad nas
116b4(mdo sde): bar bsgom par byaste/ phyi rol gyi don nang du lta ba la mngon par chags pas ni ma yin no// khyod kyis nyan tho// sa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / mu stegs can gyi
116b5(mdo sde): mngon par rtogs pa dang / tshig gi don gyi spyad yul du lhung blta ba dang / ting 'dzin du ma yin/ gtam dang / spung la dga' bar ma yin/ rig byed kyi rang bzhin duH
116b6(mdo sde): bar ma yin/ rgyal po'i dbang gis dregaso pa la lhung bar ma yin/ bsam gtan drug la sogs pa la bsam gtan par ma yin te/ lang ka'i bdag po 'di ni rgyal ba'i sras rnal 'byor
116b7(mdo sde): chen po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa/ pha rol rgol ba rab tu 'jom pa/ lta ba ngan pa sel ba/ bdag tu lta ba rnam par bzlog pa la mkhas pa/ blo zhib cing rnam par shes pa shin tu
116b8(mdo sde): 'gyur ba la mkhas pa/ theg pa chen po spyod pa rnams kyi dam tshig go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag gi so so rang gi sa la 'jug pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir khyod kyis brtson par gyis
117a1(mdo sde): shig/ de ltar byas na lang ka'i bdag po gang khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin la mkhas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas yongasu bzung ba'i lam 'di ni phyir zhing gong nas gong du rnam par
117a2(mdo sde): sbyong ba yin te/ ji ltar byis pa mu stegs can gyi rnal 'byor la rnal 'byor can bdag du 'dzin par snang ba'i mtshan nyid la mngon par chags pa 'byung ba dang / yon+dan dang rdzas kyi rje su spyod pa
117a3(mdo sde): ma rig pa'i rkyen tu lta ba la mngon par chags pas mngon par zhen pa/ stong pa dang / skye bas g.yengs pa rnam par rtog pa la mngon par chags pa/ mtshan nyid lhung ba'i bsam pas
117a4(mdo sde): brtags pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang // / mu stegs can gyi rje su 'jug pa'i sgo'i spyod yul ni/ ma yin no// lang ka'i bdag po bdag gi so so rang gis rig
117a5(mdo sde): pa rtogs par byed pa'i theg pa chen po khong du chud pa 'di ni gzugs sna tshogs rab tu 'thob par byed pa'o// bye bra ga gi srid par skye ba yongasu 'thob par yang 'gyuraro// lang ka'i
117a6(mdo sde): bdag po theg pa chen po'i rnal 'byor la 'jug pa 'di ni/ khebs pa'i g.yogs ma rnam par shes pa sna tshogs kyi rlabs zlog par byed pa yin te/ mu stegs can gyi rnal 'byor gyi gan su ltung
117a7(mdo sde): ba ni ma yin// lang ka'i bdag po mu stegs can gyi rnal 'byor ni// mu stegs can rnams kyi bdag tu mngon par zhen pa las byung ba'o// rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gnyis kyi don la
117a8(mdo sde): chags par lta bas/ mu stegs can rnams kyi 'di yang rnal 'byor ma yino// lang ka'i bdag po de leg so// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing ji ltar rje su bsams pa don de nyid rje su songs
117b1(mdo sde): shig dang / de nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba yino// de nas de'i skab su 'bong 'grogs 'di snyam du sems te/ yang 'di ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das/ rnal 'byor thams cad
117b2(mdo sde): ma mnga' mdzad pa/ mu sngags can gyi rnal 'byor rnam par thug pasas rang gis rig pa'i stong sul ston pa/ 'phrul bas sprul pa dang / bral bathug su chung ba'i bral gang gi phyir rnal rgya
117b3(mdo sde): can rnams rnal 'byor mngon par rtogs pa'i dus na/ ting 'dzin gyi bde ba dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams khong du chud par 'gyur te/ khong du chud pa'i phyir 'dis/ khong du chung
117b4(mdo sde): zhes rnal 'byor can rnams kyi sgrar gdags te/ de'i phyir bdag gis thugs rje can/ nyon mongs pa 'bar da ba'i rgyu dang / rnam par rtog pa zang bar byed pa// rgyal ba'i sras
117b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis yongasu bskor ba/ sems can thamasad kyi sems dang / bsam pa'i rje su zhugs pa thams cadu khyab pa thams cad mkhyen pa la byed pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par
117b6(mdo sde): log pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis de ltar blta'o// de mthong bas ni khong du ma chud pa khong du chud par bya'o// rnam par mi rtog pa la spyod pa/ bde ba'i ting 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pas gnas pa de
117b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas thugasu chud pa'i sa thob par byed pa/ bdag gis khong du chud pa yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyuraro snyamo// de na sa bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lang ka'i bdag po ma skyes
117b8(mdo sde): pa'i chos la bzod pa thob par thugasu chud nas/ 'grin bcu la thugs brtse ba'i phyir rin po che mang pos brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dra bas bres pa'i bdag gi ri'i rtse mo la mdzes pa de lta bu nyid du
118a1(mdo sde): bdag nyid bstan na// yang lang ka'i bdag po 'grin bcus mthong ba dang / myong ba'i mdzes pa dang / rtse mo la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
118a2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i sku dang / ri bo re re la bdag gi lus dong / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
118a3(mdo sde): spyan sngar 'dug pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros chen po thabs gcig so so rang gis rig pa'i spyod yul gyi gtam mdzad pa dang / gnod sbyin gyis bskor cing bshad pa brjod pa'i gtam
118a4(mdo sde): gsung ba dang / mgon po dang bcas pa'i zhing de dag kyang mthong dbar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe / sang+yas kyi sha'i spyan gyis 'khor la gzigs nas seng ges
118a5(mdo sde): rgyal po ltar rnam par bsgyings te/ gzhang mo cher gzhad nas mdzod spu dang rtsibs logs dang / brla dang / rkeng pa 'i phyogs dang / dpal gyi be'u dang / spu'i khung bu thams
118a6(mdo sde): cad nas 'od zer ni rab tu 'byin/ dus kyi mtha'i me bzhin du ni 'bar/ gzi brjod ni 'ja' lta bu 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ni nyi ma shar ba 'dra bar shin tu 'bar/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 
118a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis ni mkha'i dbyings nas blta zhing ri rab kyi rtse mo la 'gran pa'i zom la bzhugs nas bzhed mo cher bzhed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor de dang / brgya byin da
118a8(mdo sde): tshangs pa la sogs pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis de ltar bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la mnga' mdzad pa/ sngon du 'dzum pas banang mo tshar bzhad cing rang gi skul
118b1(mdo sde): 'odaper rab tu 'byin phyung nas kyang bdag gis sa rang gis rig pa'i 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi mthong ba'i spyod yul ting 'dzin gyi bde ba la dgongs pa rab tu bzhag ste/ gzigs ma med par meng ge
118b2(mdo sde): ltabs phyog su gzigs nas/ 'bod 'grogs kyi rnal 'byor rtogs pa la rje su dgongs shing cang mi gsung bar gyur snyam// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bzla gros chen pos sngam
118b3(mdo sde): gsal ba btabs pa// 'bod 'grogs la snang rtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag gi sems dang bsam pa dang rnam par dpyong ba yang shes shing / ma 'ongs pa'i skyem mtsham
118b4(mdo sde): yang bltas nas/ bshad pa brjod pa la mngon par dga' ba'i sa mas can rnams dang / sgra ji bzhin du mngon par zhen/ rnams dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / mu stegs
118b5(mdo sde): can gyi rnal 'byor gyi stobs la mngon par zhes pa thams cad 'dzi ltar/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa shes pa'i yul las phyir log pa rnams kyang banang mo char
118b6(mdo sde): bzhadad snyam du sems shing / sems rnam par myong bar gyur na mi rung snyam nas de dag gi ngo mtshar rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dang rkyen gang
118b7(mdo sde): gis 'di ltar 'dzum pa mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blo gros chen po legaso legaso// yang blo gros chen po gang khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin dang / 'jig rten rnams
118b8(mdo sde): kyi lta ba ngan pa la ltas te/ dus gsum gyi sems khong du chud pas/ ngal dri bar brtsams pa ni blo gros chen po khyod leg so// de ltar mkhas pa rnams kyi bdag dang / gzhan gyi don dang gnyis
119a1(mdo sde): don du yongasu 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can du bya'o// blo gros chen po lang ka'i bdag po 'bod 'grogs 'di ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
119a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams la dri ba gnyis dri so// dang la yang gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / mu stegs can gyi rnal 'byor la rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis ma myong ba'i dri ba gnyis kyi bye brag khong du chu
119a3(mdo sde): pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bsgom pa'i phyir 'dri bar 'dod do// 'di ltar 'dri bar 'dod pa'i mgrin bcu 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i rgyal ba rnams la'ang 'dri bar 'gyur ro// de bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen
119a4(mdo sde): bzhin du/ lang ka'i bdag po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ nga // lang ka'i bdag po khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas skabs phyes/ cod pan rab tu g.yo ba ma sdod par ci dang ci 'dod pa ngal
119a5(mdo sde): dris shig dang / ngas dri ba de dang de'i lung bstan pas ji lta/ ra khyod rnam par rtog pa'i gnas shin tu gyur nas sa'i/ mi mthun pa'i phyogs la mkhas shing rab tu 'byed pa'i blos/ so
119a6(mdo sde): so rang gis rig pa'i tshul gyis mtshan nyid kyi ting 'dzin gyi bde bar gnas pa la rnam par dpyod cing / ting 'dzin gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni yongasu gzung / zhi ba'i bde ba la ni rnam par gnas te/ 
119a7(mdo sde): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin gyi nyes pa las 'das nas/ mi g.yo ba dang / dge ba'i blo gros dang / chos kyi sprin gyi sa la ni rnam par gnas/ chos la bdag med pa'i yang dag pa ji
119a8(mdo sde): lta ba bzhin du la ni rab tu mkhas pas rin po che'i pad+mo chen po bting ba la ti 'dzin gyi rgyal bas dbang skur ba thob par 'gyur zhing / de dang rjesu 'thun pa'i pad+mo la bdag gi lus rnam pa sna tshog su byin
119b1(mdo sde): gyis rlabs kyis byin du brlabs te/ pad+mod dag la bdag gi lus 'dug par mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / gcig gi gdong la gcig lta bar byed par 'gyur ba dang / de ltar gang gi phyir bsam gyis
119b2(mdo sde): mi khyab pa'i yul de ni mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa gcig gis mngon par bsgrub pa yin te/ spyod pa'i sa la gnas shing thabs mkhas pas yongasu bzung ba'i mngon par bsgrub pa mngon
119b3(mdo sde): par bsgrub pas/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul de yang rje su 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs mang por rnam par 'gyur ba/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 
119b4(mdo sde): mu stegs can dang / dbang po dang / nye ba'i dbang po rnam sa kyis/ sngon ma mthong ba de'ang thob par 'gyur bar/ khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas lang ka'i bdag po
119b5(mdo sde): lha mo dang bcas pa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye bas rin po che'i pad+mo'idazer gyis dri ma med pa'i 'ong / rin po che'i pad+mo dang dra
119b6(mdo sde): ba'i rin po che'i rtse mo de nas langs nas/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan dang / se mo do dang
119b7(mdo sde): do shal dang / cod pan dang / thor tshug rnam pa du ma rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs dang / sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i rgyan gyis khyad par rnam par 'phags pa gzhan dag dang / lha dang / klu
119b8(mdo sde): dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi las lhag pa las kyang 'das pa'i rnga dang / sil snyan rnams dang 'dod pa'i khamasu gtogs pa'i rol
120a1(mdo sde): mdzan byang thams cad kyang rnam par sprul pa/ gang yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gyi rol mo'i khyad par mthong ba dag kyang mngon par sprul/ bcom ldan 'das
120a2(mdo sde): dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rin po che'i dra bas ni mngon par bkab/ gos sna tshogs kyi lha'i ba dan ni rab tu bsgreng / tal bdun tsam dun namakha' las mngon par 'phags/ mchod
120a3(mdo sde): pa'i sprin chen po'i char ni mngon par phab/ rnga dang sil snyan rnams kyi sgra ni rab tu phyung ste/ na mkha' de las babs nas/ nyi ma dang glog gi 'od lta bu/ rin po che'i pad+mo chen pos brgyan
120a4(mdo sde): pa'i rin po che'i rtse mo gnyis pa la 'dug/ 'dug nas zhesar 'dzum pa sngon du byas te/ bcom ldan 'ad das kyis go skabs phye bas/ bcom ldan 'das la dri ba gnyis
120a5(mdo sde): driso// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la'ang bdag gis zhus nas/ de rnams kyis kyang lan blan te/ bcom
120a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la yang bzhu'o// bstan pa brjod pa las kyang 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams dang / khyod kyis kyang gdon mi 'tshal bar bshad par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das chos gnyis
120a7(mdo sde): po 'di ni 'phrul pas sprul pa rnams kyis bstan pa lags te/ ngo bo'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ni ma gsung so// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni ting nge/ 
120a8(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi sgo'i spyod yul ston te/ tshig gi spyod yul gyi rnam par rtog par lhung ba ni mi ston na/ bcom ldan 'das chos la mnga' mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
120b1(mdo sde): payang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyis chos gnyis po de legs par bdag la bsha du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i sras 'di rnams kyang nyan/ bdag kyang 'tshal bar
120b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lang ka'i bdag po chos gnyis po smos shig/ srin po'i dbang po lus cod pan dang / dpung rgyan dang / se mo do dang / rdo rje mchog gi phreng ba
120b3(mdo sde): thogs shing / rgyan bzang pos lus yongasu rgyan pas gsol pa/ chos nyid kyang spang bar bgyi na/ chos ma mchis pa lta ci smos pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos gnyis pa de ji ltar spang bar 'gyur
120b4(mdo sde): chos sa ma chos ma mchis pa rnams ni gang lags/ dzi/ dar gnyis spangs pa'i chos can rnam pa rtog pa'i mtshan de nyid du lhung ba/ rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin 'byung dang / 'byung
120b5(mdo sde): ba las gyur pa ma lags pa/ kun gzhi rnam par shes pa yongasu ma rig pas khyad par gyi mtshan nyid ma ma sa pa/ skra shang 'dzings pa'i rang bzhin du gnas pa shes pa ma
120b6(mdo sde): dag cing zad par 'gyur ba'i yul can de lta bu'i rang bzhin de dag ji ltar spangs par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lang ka'i bdag po 'di ltar bum la sogs 'chag pa'i rang
120b7(mdo sde): bzhin 'jig pa'i chos can rnams/ byis pa rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul la tha dad pa'i bye brag du snang ba de bzhin du 'di la yang ci'i phyir mi gzung / byis pa rnams kyi so so'i rnam
120b8(mdo sde): par rtog pa nye bar gzung na/ chos dang chos med pa tha dad pa'i bye brag kyang yod do// 'phags pa'i ye shes khong du chud bar bya ba'i mthong bas ni ma yino// lang ka'i bdag po bum pa la
121a1(mdo sde): sogs pa'i dngos pa mtshan nyid su tshag su ltung ba rnams byis bdag gi yin te/ 'phags pa rnams kyim yin pa lta nog pa rang bzhin gcig cing 'bar ba gcig las byung / 
121a2(mdo sde): ba'i bar du 'bar ba/ khyim dang gnas dang bskyed mos tshal dang khang pa 'dug pa shing gi dbang gis 'od ring ba dang / thung nga'i khyad par dang / tha dad pa'i bye brag du snang ba de bzhin du 'di la yang chos dang chos
121a3(mdo sde): med pa tha dad pa'i bye brag yod par ci'i phyir mi gzung / me lce'i rgyud gcig tu gyur pa'i 'od 'phro ba tha dad pa'i bye brag du snang ba 'ba' shig tu yang ma zad de/ lang ka'i bdag po sa bon gcig las byung
121a4(mdo sde): yang myu gu dang ljang bu dang sogs ma dang / tshig dang lo mang / yal ga dang / me tog dang 'bras bu dang / gra ma'i bye brag yod pa de bzhin du phyi nang gi chos skye ba'i chos can ma rig pa lnga
121a5(mdo sde): rab tu byung ba phung po dang / khams dang / skye mche du gtogs pa thams cad dang / khams gsum du skyes pa'i chos thams cad la bde ba'i dbyibs dang / brjod pa dang / 'gro ba'i
121a6(mdo sde): khyad par dag kyang snang ste/ mtshan nyid gcig pa'i rnam par shes pa yul la mngon par 'dzin par rab tu 'jug pa'i khyad par rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma'i bye brag dang / rnam par byang ba dang / dge ba
121a7(mdo sde): dang / mi dge bar yang snang // lang ka'i bdag po chos de dag gi tha dad pa'i bye brag du yang ma zad/ rnal 'byor can rnal 'byor sgom pa rnams kyi rnal 'byor gyi lam la yang so so rang gis rig pa'i mtshan
121a8(mdo sde): nyid kyi khyad par snang na/ so so'i rnam par rtog pa las byung ba'i chos dang / chos med pa'i khyad par lta ci'i phyir med de yod do// lang ka'i bdag po rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir/ chos dang
121b1(mdo sde): chos med pa tha dad pa'i bye brag yod ngo do// lang ka'i bdag po de la chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mu stegs can dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byis pa rnams kyi rnam par rtog pas/ 
121b2(mdo sde): rnam par gtags pa dang / rgyu las yon+dan dang / rdzas kyis gzhi bcugs pa ni chos rnams shes bya'o// de dag ni spang bar bya ba btang bar bya ba ste/ mtshan nyi du so sor rnam par brtag par
121b3(mdo sde): mi bya'o// rang gi sems snang ba'i chos rnams mngon par zhen pa'i phyir/ rdza ma la sogs pa'i chos byis pas kun brtags pa/ lus su ma red pa'i rnams ni med pa yin te/ de lta bur lhag
121b4(mdo sde): mthong gis rab tu mthong na spangs par 'gyuraro// de la chos med pa rnams gang zhe na/ gang de dag bdag nyid du ma re da pa yin te/ mtshan nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa rgyu ba med pa
121b5(mdo sde): chos kyi don gyi rgyu las byung ba de dag yang dag pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin par 'jug pa med par mthong nas/ de'i phyir chos med pa spong bar 'gyur ro// yang bdag nyidadu/ 
121b6(mdo sde): ma red pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ri bong dang / rnga mo dang / bong bu dang / rta'i rwa dang / mo sham gyi bu la sogs pa'i chos rnams te/ bdag nyid du ma red pa'i phyir de dag ni mtshan
121b7(mdo sde): nyid du brtag par mi bya'i/ gzhan du na tha snyad kyi don du brjod de/ bum pa la sogs pa ltar mngon par chags pas ni ma yino// ji ltar de dag rnam par shes pas gzung du med pa'i phyir/ 
121b8(mdo sde): spang bar bya ba de bzhin du rnam par rtog pa'i dngos po rnams kyang spang bar bya ba yin te/ de'i phyir chos dang chos med pa spang ba yino// lang ka'i bdag po khyod kyis chos med pa gnyis ji lta bur
122a1(mdo sde): spang bar bya zhes smras pa de ni 'di ltar bshad do// gang yang lang ka'i bdag po khyod kyis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
122a2(mdo sde): rgyas rnams la'ang bdag gis dris te/ de dag gis kyang lan bla na no zhes smras pa yang lang ka'i bdag po sngon zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par rtog pa'i tshig bla dgas te/ 'das pa la yang 'di ltar
122a3(mdo sde): 'das pa zhes rnam par rtog go// de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar yang rtog ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni de'i chos nyid kyis rnam par mi rtog pa/ rnam par rtog pa'i spros pa
122a4(mdo sde): thams cad las 'das pa ste/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid la brtag pa da ltar ni ma yin gyi/ gzhan du na ye shes thug su chu dad pa bde ba'i don du mtshan ma med pa la spyod pa'i shes
122a5(mdo sde): rab kyis rnam par bsgom mo// de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rna mas ni ye shes kyi bdag nyid ye shes kyi sku ste brtag par mi bya'o// gang gis mi rtag ce na/ yid kyis
122a6(mdo sde): bdag dang / srog dang / gang zag tu mi rtago/ ji ltar mi brtag ce na/ yul gyi don gyi rgyu las byung ba'i yid kyi rnam par shes pas/ ji ltar gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang // dbyibs
122a7(mdo sde): dang rnam pa bzhin du mi brtag go// de bas na khyod kyis brtag par bya ba dang / rnam par rtog pa dang bral bar bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po 'di ltar yang sems can gyi spyod pa rnams ni rtsig
122a8(mdo sde): pa'i ri mo'i gzugs dang 'dra ste/ yang ka'i bdag po chos thams cad yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'jig rten gnas pa ni g.yo ba med pa ste/ las dang byed pa dang bral ba'o// 'di la gang yang
122b1(mdo sde): nyan pa'am/ mnyan par bya ba med do// lang ka'i bdag po 'jig rten gnas pa ni/ sprul pa dang mtshungs na mu stegs can byis pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams rnam par mi sgom mo// lang ka'i bdag
122b2(mdo sde): po gang gis de ltar mthong ba des ni yang dag par mthong ba ste/ rnam pa bzhin du mthong na rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa'o// de ltar rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa rnams ni rnam pa gnyi su 'dzin te/ 'di
122b3(mdo sde): lta ste/ me long gi nang na yod pa'i gzugs brnyan dang / chu la bdag gi lus kyi grib ma dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / khyim na mar me 'bar ba la bdag gi lus kyi grib ma dang / brag cha'am/ gzhan
122b4(mdo sde): yang bdag gi rnam par rtog pa'i gzung ba rab tu bzung ste/ chos da dang chos med par rnam par rtog cing / chos dang chos me dad par spong ba la mi spyod de spyod do// rnam par rtog go// rgya
122b5(mdo sde): par byed do// rab tu zhi ba mi 'thob bo// 'di ni rtse gcig pa'i tshe ga bla dgas te/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bdag gis 'phags pa so so rang gi ye shes kyi spyod// 
122b6(mdo sde): yul du 'jug pa'i phyir/ mchog gi tingange 'dzin skye ba'o// 'bod 'grogs kyis gsol ba btab pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rgyu/ 
122b7(mdo sde): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po byang chub sems dpa' blo gros dang lhan cig tu/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus bstan las langs te bla gos phrag pa cig la gzar nas
122b8(mdo sde): pus po g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// 
123a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten skye 'jig ma mchis te// namakha'i me tog rab tu 'dra// khyod kyi shes rab thugs rje yis// khyod kyi yod dang med ma dmigs// chos rnams
123a2(mdo sde): thams cad sgyu ma bzhin// sems dang rnam par shes pa spangs// khyod kyi shes rab thugs rje yis// khyod kyis yod dang med ma dmigs// 'jig rten rtag dang chang spangs pa// khur zug
123a3(mdo sde): rmi lam 'dra ba ste// khyod kyi shes rab thugs rje yis// khyod kyis yod dang med ma dmigs// chos dang gang zag bdag med dang // khyod kyis nyon mongs shes bya'i rnams// khyod kyi shes
123a4(mdo sde): rab thugs rjes dang // mtshan ma med pas rtag tu dag/ sgyu ma rmi lam rang bzhin gyi// chos kyi sku la ji skad ba stong // dngos po rang bzhin med rnams kyi// ma skyes de ni// 
123a5(mdo sde): bstod pa lags// dbang po don dang rnam bral zhing // snaming de yi gzigs pa bas// gal te stong ngam smad kying rung // thub pa de la ji skad brjod// mya ngan mi 'da' 'ang
123a6(mdo sde): bab min// khyod la mya ngan 'da' mi gnas// blo dang rig par bgyi dang bral// yod dang med pa'i phyogs kyang spangs// de ltar skye 'jig spangs pa yi// thub pa zhi ba sus mthong ba// 
123a7(mdo sde): de dag 'di dang slad mar yang // chags med nyer len ma mchis 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen pos bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshig/ 
123a8(mdo sde): su gcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// bdag gi ming dang rigs bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan pa dag ni tho chen te// theg chen khong du chud par gtogs
123b1(mdo sde): dri ba rgya mtsho rtsa brgyad pa// gsung ba'i mchog la zhu bar bgyi// de'i tshig de gnas pa dang // sangs rgyas 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i mchog/ thams cad 'khor la rnam gzigs nas// bde gshegs
123b2(mdo sde): sras la gsung ba ni// nga la dris shig rgyal sras rnams// blo gros chen po khyod kyang dris// so so rang rig spyod yul ni// nga yis khyod la bshad par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
123b3(mdo sde): skabs phye bas// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba zhus pa/ ji ltar rtog ge rnam dag
123b4(mdo sde): 'gyur/ rtog ge ci yi slad du 'byung // ji lta bur na nor ba gda'// ci yi slad du nor ba 'byung // ci'i slad du spru// dang zhing // khyod kyis mtshan dang mu stegs kyang // snang
123b5(mdo sde): med rim pa ci sladadu// khyod kyi rgyal sras gang las lags / grol ba gang du mchi bar 'gyur// bcings pa su log gang gis 'grol// bsam gtan pa'i yul de gang // 
123b6(mdo sde): ji ltar theg pa gsum po lags// rkyen gyis skye ba de dag ci// 'bras bu ci zhig rgyu ni gang // gnyis kyi mtha' brjod ci slad du// ji lta bur yang 'byung ba lags// gzugs med snyom
123b7(mdo sde): par 'jug pa dang / 'gog pa de yang ji lta bu// 'du shes 'gog pa ji lta bu// ci slad ji ltar sad par 'gyur// 'gro ba dang ni lus 'dzin kyang // ci yi sladadu bya ba 'byung // ji ltar
123b8(mdo sde): snang ba rnam par bsgom// ji ltar sa la 'jug par 'gyur// srid gsum choms nas pha des su// gnas ni gang lags lus ni ci// gnas shing 'gro ba gang zhig du// rgyal ba'i
124a1(mdo sde): sras su ji ltar 'gyur// dbang dang ting 'dzin rnams dang // mngon par she pa ji ltar 'thob// ji ltar sems ni mnyam par 'jog/ rgyal ba khyu mchog bdag la gsu
124a2(mdo sde): yid dang rnam par shes pa dang // kun gzhi de yang ji lta bur// snang la ji ltar 'jug pa lags// ji ltar snang las slad du ldog/ rigs dang rigs med ji ltar cis// sems tsam
124a3(mdo sde): du yang ci ltar 'gyur// mtshan rnams rnam par dgod pa dang // bdag med pa yang ji ltar 'gyur// sems can ma mchis ji lta bu// kun rdzob bshad ba ji lta bu// ji ltar rtags dang chang
124a4(mdo sde): pa yi// lta ba rab tu 'byung mi 'gyur// ji ltar khyod dang mu stegasu// mtshan nyid rnams kyis 'gal mi 'gyur// / sde pa rnams kyang ji lta bur// ma 'ongs dus na 'byung ba gsung
124a5(mdo sde): ci spang ji ltar stong pa nyid// ji ltar khyod kyi skad cig 'jigasnying po ji ltar 'byung ba lags// ji ltar 'jig rten byed ma mchis// ci slang 'jig rten smig rgyu 'dra// dri za 'dra
124a6(mdo sde): dang smig rgyu dang // chu yi zla ba 'dra ba yang // ci yi slad pa bdag la gsungs// byang chub yan lag ji ltar cis// byang chub phyogs rnams ci las 'byung // yul 'khrug pa dang khrag 'khrug dang / 
124a7(mdo sde): ji ltar 'byung ba blta bar 'gyur// ma skyes pa dang ma 'gag pa// ji ltar na mkha'i me tog 'dra// 'jig rten ji ltar thugasu chung // yi ge med pa ji ltar gsungs// ci yis rnam par mi rtog
124a8(mdo sde): 'gyur// ji ltar na mkha' 'dra ba lags// de bzhin nyid ni rnam pa du// sems dang pha rol phyinang du// gang gis sa yi rim par 'gyur// snang med rgyu ba gang zhig lags/ 
124b1(mdo sde): gang gis bdag med rnams pa gnyis// shes bya ji ltar rnam par dag/ mgon po ye shes rnam pa dang // tshul khrims sems can 'byung gnas du// nor bu mu tig gser 'byung ba'i// 
124b2(mdo sde): rigs rnams su yi rab tu phyung // sems can dngos po'i sna grangs dang // mngon par brjod pa su yi bskyed// rig pa'i gnas dang bzo' rnams// gang gis ji ltar rab tu bshad// 
124b3(mdo sde): tshigasu bcad pa rnam pa du// tshigs bcang rkyang ba ji lta bu// rigs pa rnam pa du zhig mchis// bshad pa dag kyang ji ltar 'gyur// skom dang kha zas sna tshogs dang // ji ltar
124b4(mdo sde): khrig pa 'byung bar 'gyur// rgyal po 'khor los sgyur deb dang // khams kyi bdag po ji ltar lags/ ji ltar rgyal sringad bsrungs par 'gyur// lha yi rig la
124b5(mdo sde): rnam pa du// sa dang skar tshogs ci las gyur// nyi zla gnyi sa kyang ji lta bu// thar pa rnam pa du zhig mchis/ rnal 'byor ldan pa rnam pa du// slob ma rnam pa du zhig
124b6(mdo sde): mchis// slob dpon du'ang ji ltar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnam pa du zhig lags// skyes pa'i rabs la rnam pa du// bdud la rnam pa du zhig mchis// ya mtshan can yang rnam pa
124b7(mdo sde): du// khyod kyi rang bzhin rnam pa du// ri mo rnam pa du zhig mchis// brtags pa tsam yang ji lta bur// smra ba'i mchog gis bdag la gsungs// na mkha'i sprin rlung ci las gyur// 
124b8(mdo sde): dran dang yid bzhungs ji ltar 'byung // shing gi khri shing ji ltar mchis// srid gsum dbang pos bdag la gsungs// glang po ri dgas rta blun rnams// gzung du rung ba ci sladadu// 
125a1(mdo sde): ngan pa'i mi rnams ci las gyur// bdag la sems lus sgyur bas gsungs// khams drug 'dzin pa ci slad du// 'dod chen par yang ji ltar 'gyur// skyes pa bung
125a2(mdo sde): med mi nang rnams// ji ltar skye 'gyur bdag la gsungs// rnal 'byor las ni ji ltar ldog/ rnal 'byor la yang ji ltar 'jug/ ci 'dra'i skyes bu ji ltar bur// rnal 'byor bzhag/ 
125a3(mdo sde): pa bdag la gsungs// 'gro bar phyin pa'i sems can gyi// mtshan nyid mtshan mdze lta bu// gang gis ji ltar phyug por 'gyur// mkha' 'dras bdag la bka' stsol cig
125a4(mdo sde): ji ltar ci yis shAkya'i rigs// bu ram shing skyes ji ltaradabyung // yun rings drang srong bka' thub gang // khyodadakyings ni ji ltar brlabs// khyod nyid zhing rnams thams
125a5(mdo sde): cad du/ mtshan dang de bzhin gzugs sna tshogs// rgyal ba'i sras kyis bskor bar yang // ci'i slad du kun na gda'// ji ltar sha rnams zar mi rung // ji ltar sha rmam
125a6(mdo sde): bkag pa lags// sha za'i rigasu skyes pa rnams// sha 'tshal bar yang ji ltar gyur// ji ltar zhing rnams nyi zla'i dbyibs// ri rab pad+mo 'dra ba dang // dpal be'u seng ge'i dbyibs/ 
125a7(mdo sde): 'dra ba// ci yi slad pa bdag la gsungs// go 'dun dag dang spyi tshugs dang // mig 'phrul 'dra ba ci lta bu// rin chen kun gyi zhing rnams kyang // ji ltar ci srang bdag la gsungs// ping
125a8(mdo sde): rnga'i dbyibs 'dra ba// 'bras bu me tog sna tshogs 'dra// nyi zla dag dang rnam bral ba// ji ltar ci spang bdag la gsungs// la la sprul pa'i sangs rgyas dang // sangs rgyas la la rnam
125b1(mdo sde): smin byung // yang dag ye shes sangs rgyas rnams// ji ltar ci slad bdag la gsungs// ci slad ji ltar 'dod khams// rnam sangs ma rgyas bdag la gsungs// ci yi don du 'og min du// chag
125b2(mdo sde): bral khrod du mngon sangs rgyas// bde gshegs mya ngan 'das nas go// bstan pa su zhig 'dzin par 'gyur// ston pa ji srid rab tu zhugs// tshul yang ji srid gnas par 'gyur// khyod kyi
125b3(mdo sde): grub mtha' rnam pa du// lta ba dag kyang rnam pa du// dge slong dgongs kyang 'dul ba yang // ci slad ci ltar bdag la gsungs// rang rgyal rgyal sras nyan thos kyi// ci slad 'gyur ba brgya po dang // 
125b4(mdo sde): snang ba med pa brgya po yang // ci yi slad pa bdag la gsungs// 'jig rten mngon shes gang gis 'byung // 'jig rten 'das kyi'ang ji lta bur// sems dngas rnams bdun po
125b5(mdo sde): yang // ji ltar ci slad bdag la gsungs// khyod kyi dge 'dun rnam pa du// ji ltar dge 'dun dben du 'gyur// se mas can gso ba'i gtsug lag kyang // ji ltar ci slad bdag
125b6(mdo sde): la gsungs// 'od srung log par dad sel dang // gser thub kyang ni nga yin zhes// rgyal ba'i sras la gsung bde// thub pa chen po ci slang gsungs// bdag dang sems can cis med
125b7(mdo sde): brjod// rtag dang 'jig gtam ji lta bur// ci slad sems tsam yang dag nyid// thams cad du na bshad mi mdzad// ci slad skyes bu na chung tshal// a ru ra dang skyu ru tshal// ke las dang
125b8(mdo sde): khor yug ra// rdo rje sra ba'ang ji lta bu// de yi nang na du ma'i ri// rin chen sna tshogs rab brgyan cing // drang srong dri zas kun gang ba/ ji ltar ci slad bdag la gsungs// theg pa che tshul
126a1(mdo sde): sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs mchog 'di// sangs rgyas 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i phul// lha chen gyis ni gsan pa dang // shes rab chen po legaso legs// 
126a2(mdo sde): khyod kyis yongasu gang dris pa// de ni rims kyis ngas bshad kyis// blo chen nga las shes par byos// skye dang skye ba med pa dang // ji ltar mya ngan 'das dang stong // 'bo dang rang bzhin med pa
126a3(mdo sde): dang / sangs rgyas pha rol phyin dang sras// nyan thos rgyal ba'i sras rnams dang // gzugs med spyod pa'i mu stegs dang // ri rab rgya mtsho ri rnams dang // gling dang sa dang zhing rnams dang // 
126a4(mdo sde): skar ma nyi ma zla ba dang // mu stegs lha dang lha ma yin// rnam thar dbang dang mngon shes dang // stobs dang bsam dgatan ting nge 'dzin// 'gog dang rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang / 
126a5(mdo sde): byang chub yan lag lam rnams dang // tshad med rnams da/ nga bsam gtan dang // phung po rnams dang 'gro 'ong da nga // snyoms par 'jug dang 'gog pa dang // ldang dang
126a6(mdo sde): sna tshogs bshad pa dang // sems dang yid dang rnam shes dang // bdag med pa dang chos lnga dang // rang bzhin rtog dang brtag pa dang // snang dang lta gnyis ji lta bu// theg pa rnams/ 
126a7(mdo sde): kyi 'byung gan sa dang // gser nor mu tig 'byung ba'i rigs// 'dod chen po dang 'byung chen dang // sangs rgyas gcig dang dkrugs ma dang // shes dang shes bya 'byung thob dang / 
126a8(mdo sde): sems can srid dang mi sring dang // ci phyir glang por dgas rta// ji ltar gzung rung bdag la gsungs// dpe dang rgyu rnams ldan pa yi// grub pa'i mtha' bshad ji lta bu// rgyu dang 'bras bu/ 
126b1(mdo sde): ci yi phyir// tshul dang nor pa sna tshogs dang // sems tsam ste ni snang ba med// sa rnams la yang rim pa med// snang ba med dang 'gyur ba rnams// brgya po ci phyir bdag la gsungs// gso
126b2(mdo sde): ba'i gtsug lag bzo rnams dang // sgyu rtsal rig lung de bzhin te// ri bo de bzhin ri rab dang // sa yi tshad kyang ji lta bur// nyi ma zla ba rgya mtsho yi// tshad ni ji tsam bdag la gsungs// sems
126b3(mdo sde): can lus la rdul gyi rnams// rab dang 'bring dang tha ma du// zhing dang zhing la rdul rnams du// mdom dang mdom la ji snyed mchis// khams dang khams la ji snyed mchis// khru mdom gom pa
126b4(mdo sde): rgyang grags dang // dpag tshad phyed dang dpag tshad la/ da ri bong nyi zer srom dang // lug gi dang ni nas kyang du// bre gang la ni nas 'bru du// bre phyed la yang nas 'bru du// de
126b5(mdo sde): bzhin bre bo khal cig la// 'bum dang bye ba shu rngog du// yungs kar la ni rdul phran du// 'ol ma sel yungs kar du/ ri gcig la ni 'ol sa du// nam cig la ni ri du yod// zho tsa
126b6(mdo sde): la ni nam du yod// srang cig la yang no du yod// rtsis kyi rtsis 'go 'di lta bur// ri rab la ni srang du yod// de skad bu yis ngal dris// rnam pa gzhan du ci phyir 'dri// rang rgyal dag dang nyan
126b7(mdo sde): thos dang // sangs rgyas rnams dang rgyal sras kyi// sku la rdul phran du yod ces// de skad ci phyir 'dri mi byed// me lce la ni rdul phran du// rlung la yang ni rdul phran du/ 
126b8(mdo sde): dbang po gcig cing rdul phran du// smin ma'i spu'i khung bu du// phyug po'i mi rnams ci las gyur// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang // rgyal srid cis bsrung de dag gis// de dag ji ltar thar
127a1(mdo sde): / par 'gyur// tshigs bcad rkyang ba ji ltar smra// 'khrig 'gro ba sna tshogs dang // bas skom rnam pa mang po dang // ji ltar skyes bun chung chal// ji ltar ci spang ri bo rnams/ 
127a2(mdo sde): rdo rje ltar sra bdag la smos// sgyu ma rmi 'dra ci phyir na// smig rgyu mtshungs pa ji lta bur// gang du sprin rnams 'byung bar 'gyur// dus kyi rnams kyang ci las 'byung // ro yi bro ba ci las gyur/ 
127a3(mdo sde): ci las pho smos ma ning rnams// rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdzes pa dag/ bu khyod ngal ci phyir 'dri// ji ltar lha yi ri bo rnams// drang srong dri zas brgyan pa dag/ grol ba gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ 
127a4(mdo sde): bcing ba su zhig gang gis 'grol// bsam gtan pa yi yuH/ de gang // sprul pa dang ni mu stegs kyang // yod med byed med ci yi phyir// snang ba las ni ji ltar ldog/ rtog ge/ 
127a5(mdo sde): dag kyang ji ltar bdag/ rtog ge ci phyir 'byung bar 'gyur// byed pa ci yis 'byung bar 'gyur// 'gro ba'ang ci phyir/ bdag la gsungs// gang gis 'du shes bcad par bgyi
127a6(mdo sde): ci yis tingange 'dzin rtog par 'gyur// srid gsum chom nA pha des su// gnas gang de yi lus kyang ci// bdag dang sems can med ces brjod// kun rdzob bstan pa ji lta bur// 
127a7(mdo sde): mtshan nyid 'dri ba ci phyir bdag med 'dri ba ji lta bur// snying po sde pa ci yi phyir// ngal 'drir byed rgyal ba'i bu// rtag dang chad par lta ba dang // gang gis sems kyang mnyam par 'jog
127a8(mdo sde): brjod dang de bzhin ye shes dang // tshul khrims rigs dang rgyal ba'i bu// bla ma slob ma rigs pa ston// sems can sna tshogs ji lta bur// zas skom na mkha' yid gzhungs dang // 
127b1(mdo sde): bdud rnams dang ni btags pa tsam// shing dang 'khri shing ci phyir zhes// ci phyir rgyal sras ngal 'dra// zhing rnams sna tshogs tsal phyir// yun rings drang srong dka' thub dang // khyod kyi rigs
127b2(mdo sde): dang bla ma gang // ci phyir nga la rgyal sras 'dri// ci yi phyir na mi dag ngan// 'dod pa'i khams su 'tshang mi brgya// 'og min du ni grub pa'i mtha'// ji ltar rigs pa ngal 'dri// ci phyir
127b3(mdo sde): mngon shes 'jig rten pa// ji ltar dge slong dngosu 'gyur// sprul dang rnam smin gnas pa yi// sangs rgyas ngal ji ltar 'dra// yang dag ye shes sangs rgyas dang // dge 'dun
127b4(mdo sde): rnams kyang ji ltar 'gyur// pi bang me tog rnga 'dra dang // snang ba spangs pa'i zhing rnams dang // sems dngas rnams bdun po dag/ nga la rgyal ba'i bu yang 'dri// 'di
127b5(mdo sde): dang gzhan yang rab mang ba'i// 'dri ba ngal bus dris pa/ re rer mtshan dang rab ldan zhing // lta ba'i nyes pa rna ma spangs te// bshad pa phyogs kyi grub pa'i mtha'// 
127b6(mdo sde): ngas bshad nga las mnyan par bgyi// tshigs rnams dgod pa des bya yis// tshigs ni brgya'i rtsa brgyad po// ji ltar sangs rgyas bshad pa rnams// ngal bu yis mnyan par gyis// 
127b7(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen pos// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tshig brgya rtsa brgyad po gang lags/ bcom
127b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skye ba'i tshig dang / mi skye ba'i tshig dang / rtag pa'i tshig dang / mi rtag pa'i tshig dang / mtshan nyid kyi tshig dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i tshig/ 
128a1(mdo sde): dang gnas gzhan du gyur pa'i tshig dang / gnas gzhan du 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i tshig dang / skad cig pa'i tshig dang / skad cig pa med pa'i tshig dang / rang bzhi
128a2(mdo sde): yod pa'i tshig dang / rang bzhin med pa'i tshig dang / stong pa nyid kyi tshig dang / stong pa nyid ma yin pa'i tshig dang / chad pa'i tshig dang / chad pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang / sems kyi tshig dang / sems med
128a3(mdo sde): pa'i tshigasang / dbu ma'i tshig dang / dbu ma ma yin pa'i tshig dang / ther zug pa'i tshig dang / ther zug ma yin pa'i tshig dang / rkyen gyi tshig dang / rkyen ma yin pa'i tshig dang / rgyu'i tshig dang
128a4(mdo sde): rgyu med pa'i tshig dang / nyon mongs pa'i tshig dang / nyon mong / sa pa med pa'i tshig dang / sred pa'i tshig dang / sred pa/ med pa'i tshig dang / thabs kyi tshig dang / thabs ma
128a5(mdo sde): yin pa'i tshig dang / mkhas pa'i tshig dang / mkhas pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang / dag pa'i tshig dang / dag pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang / rigs pa'i tshig dang / rigs pa ma
128a6(mdo sde): yin pa'i tshig dang / dpe yi tshig dang / dpe ma yin pa'i tshig dang / slob ma'i tshig dang / slob ma ma yin pa'i tshig dang / bla ma'i tshig dang / bla ma ma yin pa'i tshig dang / rig kyi tshig dang / rig
128a7(mdo sde): med pa'i tshig dang / theg pa gsum gyi tshig dang / theg pa gsum med pa'i tshig dang / snang ba'i tshig dang / snang ba med pa'i tshig dang / smon pa'i tshig dang / smon pa med pa'i tshig dang / 'khor/ 
128a8(mdo sde): gsum gyi tshig dang / 'khor gsum med pa'i tshig dang / mtshan ma'i tshig dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshig dang / yod med kyi phyogs kyi tshig dang / yod med kyi phyogs ma yin pa'i tshig
128b1(mdo sde): dang / gnyis kar tshig dang / gnyis ka ma yin pa'i tshig dang / so so rang gi 'phags pa'i tshig dang / sa so rang gi 'phags parda ye shes med pa'i tshig dang / mthong ban chos la bde ba'i tshigs
128b2(mdo sde): mthong ba'i chos la bde ba med pa'i tshig dang / zhing gi tshig dang / zhing med pa'i tshig dang / rdul gyi tshig dang / rdul med pa'i tshig dang / chu'i tshig dang / chu med pa'i tshig dang / rmong ba'i
128b3(mdo sde): tshig dang / rmong pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang // yang dag pa'i tshig dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang / grangs dang rtsis kyi tshig dang / grangs dang rtsis med pa'i tshig dang / mngon par shes
128b4(mdo sde): pa'i tshig dang / mngon par shes pa med pa'i tshig dang / skyo ba'i tshig dang / skyo ba med pa'i tshig dang / stug po'i rmi ngag dang / stug po ma yin pa'i tshig dang / sgyu rtsal dang / 
128b5(mdo sde): rig pa dang / bzo'i tshig dang / sgyu rtsal dang / rig pa dang / bzo med pa'i tshig dang / rlung gi tshig dang / rlung med pa/ 'i tshig dang / sa'i tshig dang / sa med pa'i tshig dang
128b6(mdo sde): sems kyi tshig dang / sems med pa'i tshig dang / bdags pa'i tshig dang / gdag pa med pa'i tshig dang / rang bzhin gyi tshig dang / rang bzhin med pa'i tshig dang / phung po'i tshig dang / 
128b7(mdo sde): phung po med pa'i tshig dang / sems can gyi tshig dang / sems can med pa'i tshig dang / blo'i tshig dang / blo med pa'i tshig dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshig dang / mya ngan las 'das pa
128b8(mdo sde): med pa'i tshig dang / shes bya'i tshig dang / shes bya med pa'i tshig dang / mu stegs can gyi tshig dang / mu stegs can med pa'i tshig dang / khrag khrug gi tshig dang / khrag khrug ma yin
129a1(mdo sde): pa'i tshig dang / sgyu ma'i tshig dang / sgyu ma med pa'i tshig dang / rmi lam gyi tshig dang / rmi lam med pa'i tshig dang / smig rgyu'i tshig dang / smig rgyu med pa'i tshig dang
129a2(mdo sde): gzugs brnyan gyi tshig dang / gzugs brnyan med pa'i tshig dang / 'khor lo'i tshig dang / 'khor lo med pa'i tshig dang / dri za'i tshig dang / dri za ma yin pa'i tshig dang / lha'i tshig/ 
129a3(mdo sde): lha ma yin pa'i tshig dang / zas skom gyi tshig dang / zas skom med pa'i tshig dang / 'khrig pa'i tshig dang / 'khrig pa med pa'i tshig dang / lta ba'i tshig dang / lta ba med pa'i tshig
129a4(mdo sde): dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig dang / pha rol tu phyin pa me dad pa'i tshig dang / tshul khrims kyi tshig dang / tshul khri mas med pa'i tshig dang / nyi zla dang / skar ma'i tshig
129a5(mdo sde): dang / nyi zla dang skar ma med pa'i tshig dang / bden pa'i tshe ga dang / bden pa med pa'i tshig dang / 'bras bu'i tshe/ ga dang / 'bras bu med pa'i tshig dang / 'gog pa'i tshig
129a6(mdo sde): dang 'gog pa med pa'i tshig dang / 'gog pa las ldang ba'i tshig dang / 'gog pa las ldang ba med pa'i tshig dang / gso ba'i tshig dang / gso ba med pa'i tshig dang / mtshan gyi tshig
129a7(mdo sde): dang / mtshan med pa'i tshig dang / yan lag gi tshig dang / yan lag med pa'i tshig dang / sgyu rtsal rig pa'i tshig dang / sgyu rtsal rig pa med pa'i tshig dang / bsam gtan gyi tshig dang
129a8(mdo sde): bsam gtan med pa'i tshig dang / nor pa'i tshig dang / nor pa meng pa'i tshig dang / snang ba'i tshig dang / snang ba med pa'i tshig dang / bsrung ba'i tshig dang / bsrung ba med pa'i tshig dang
129b1(mdo sde): rus kyi tshig dang / rus med pa'i tshig dang / drang srong gi tshig dang / drang srong ma yin pa'i tshig dang / rgyal po'i srid kyi tshig dang / rgyal po'i srid ma yin pa'i tshig dang / gzung ba'i tshig dang
129b2(mdo sde): gzung ba med pa'i tshig dang / rin po che'i tshig dang / rin po che med pa'i tshig dang / lung bstan pa'i tshig dang / lung bstan pa med pa'i tshig dang / 'dod chen po'i tshig dang / 'dod chen po med
129b3(mdo sde): pa'i tshig dang / pho smos dang ma ning gi tshig dang / pho smos dang ma ning med pa'i tshig dang / bro ba'i tshig dang / bro ba med pa'i tshig dang / byed pa'i tshig dang / byed pa med pa'i tshig dang / lus kyi
129b4(mdo sde): tshig dang / lus med pa'i tshig dang / rto ga'i tshig dang / rtog ge/ med pa'i tshig dang / g.yo ba'i tshig dang / g.yo ba med pa'i tshig dang / dbang po'i tshig dang / dbang po med pa'i tshig dang / 
129b5(mdo sde): 'dus byas kyi tshig dang / 'du byas med pa'i tshig dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tshig dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu med pa'i tshig dang / 'og ma'i tshig dang / 'og min gyi tshig dang / dus kyi
129b6(mdo sde): tshig dang / dus med pa'i tshig dang / shing dang shing gel pa dang / lcug ma gyes pa'i tshig dang / shing dang shing gel pa dang / lcug ma gyes pa med pa'i tshig dang / sna tshogs kyi tshig
129b7(mdo sde): dang sna tshogs med pa'i tshig dang / bstan pas gzung ba'i tshig dang / bstan pas gzung ba med pa'i tshig dang / 'dul ba'i tshig dang / 'dul ba med pa'i tshig dang / 
129b8(mdo sde): dge slong gi tshig dang / dge slong med pa'i tshig dang / byin gyis rlabs pa'i tshig dang / byin gyis rlabs med pa'i tshig dang / yi ge'i tshig dang / yi ge med pa'i
130a1(mdo sde): tshig dang / 'di dag ni tha gros chen po sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis brjod pa'i tshig brgya rtsa brgyad // / bam po gnyis pa// de nas byang chub sems
130a2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa rnams kyi skye ba dang / gnas dang / 'gag pa rnam pa du mchi
130a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blo gros chen po rnam par shes pa rnams kyi skye ba dang / gnas dang / 'gag pa la rnam pa gnyis yod do// rtog ge rnams kyi khong du mi chu // 'di lta ste/ 
130a4(mdo sde): rgyun 'gag pa dang / mtshan nyid 'gag pa'o// rnam par she das pa rnams kyi skye ba yang rnam pa gnyis te/ rgyun skye bad / mtshan nyid skye ba'o// gnas pa yang rnam pa gnyis te/ 
130a5(mdo sde): rgyun gnas pa dang / mtshan nyid gnas pa'o// blo gros chen kho rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa gsum ste/ 'jug pa 'i mtshan nyid dang / las kyi mtshan nyid dang / rigs kyi
130a6(mdo sde): mtshan nyid do// blo gros chen po mtshan nyid brgyad du gsungs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni/ mdor na rnam pa gnyis te/ snang ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / dngos po so sor rnam par rtog pa'i rnam
130a7(mdo sde): par shes pa'o// blo gros chen po ji ltar me long la gzugs bzhin du snang ba la/ snang ba'i rnam par shes pa 'dzin te/ blo gros chen po snang ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / dngos po so sor rnam par rtog
130a8(mdo sde): pa'i rnam par shes pa de gnyis ni/ mtshan nyid tha mi dad cing gcig gi rgyu gcig go// blo gros chen po de la snang ba'i rnam par shes pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bag chags yong su 'gyur ba'i rgyu las
130b1(mdo sde): byung ba'o// blo gros chen po dngos po so sor rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par shes pa ni/ yul la rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu las byung ba dang / thog ma med pa'i dus kyi spros pa'i bag chags kyi rgyu las byung ba'o// 
130b2(mdo sde): de la blo gros chen po dbang po'i rnam par shes pa thams cad 'gag pa ni 'di lta ste/ kun gzhi rnam pa'i yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun rtog pa'i bag chags sna tshogs 'gog pa ste/ blo gros chen po
130b3(mdo sde): 'di ni mtshan nyid 'gag pa'o// blo gros chen po rgyun 'gag pa ni gang las 'byung ba yin te/ blo gros chen po gang las shes bya ba ni gang la gnas pa dang / gang la dmigs pa'o// de la gang
130b4(mdo sde): la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni/ thog ma med pa'i dus kyi spros pa gnas ngan len gyi bag chags so// gang la dmigs dpa zhes bya ba ni bdag gi sems snang ba rnam par shes pa'i yul
130b5(mdo sde): rnam par rtog go/ blo gros chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzi mapa'i rdul phra rab dang / 'jim pa'i gong bu ni gcig pa yang ma yin tha dad yang ma yin pa dang / ji ltar gser dang rgyan
130b6(mdo sde): bzhin te/ blo gros chen po ji ste 'jim pa'i gong bu 'jim pa'i rdul phra rab dang tha dad pa zhig yin na ni/ de dag las brtsams pa yin pa 'gyur na ni/ de ni 'jim pa'i rdul phra rab de dag las kyang
130b7(mdo sde): brtsams pas na/ de'i phyir tha dad pa ma yin no// de ste tha dad pa ma yin na ni 'jim pa'i gong bu dang / rdul phra rab du bye brag med par 'gyuraro// de bzhin du blo gros chen po 'jug pa'i
130b8(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa rnams kun gni rnam par shes pa'i rigs kyi mtshan nyid dang / gal te tha dad pa yin na ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i rgyu las byung bar mi 'gyuraro// de ste tha dad pa ma yin na na/ 
131a1(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa 'gags na/ kun gni rnam par shes pa yang 'gags par 'gyur na/ de ltar bdag gi rigs kyi mtshan nyid 'gag par yang mi 'gyur te
131a2(mdo sde): de'i phyir blo gros chen po rnam par shes pa rnams kyi rang gi rigs kyi mtshan nyid 'gag par mi 'gyur gyi/ las kyi mtshan nyid ni 'gag go// rang gi rigs kyi mtshan nyid 'gags na kun gzhi rnam
131a3(mdo sde): par shes pa yang 'gags par 'gyur te/ blo gros chen po kun gzhi rnam par shes pa 'gags na ni/ smra ba 'di yang mu stegs byed pa'i chad par smra ba dang / khyad par med par 'gyuraro// 
131a4(mdo sde): blo gros chen po mu stegs byed rnams kyi smra ba ni 'di lta ste/ da 'di ltar yul la 'dzin pa rgyun chad pas rnam par shes pa/ de'i rgyun chad par 'gyur te/ rnam par shes pa'i rgyun chad
131a5(mdo sde): pas thog ma med pa'i dus kyi rgyun kyang chad par 'gyur ba/ 'o// blo gros chen po mu stegs byed rnams ni rgyu las rgyun 'byung bar smra'i/ rgyu ma gtogs par mig gi rnam par
131a6(mdo sde): shes pa/ gzugs dang snang ba 'das pa las 'byung bar mi smra ste/ blo gros chen po rgyu ni gtso bo dang / skyes bu dang / dbang po dang / dus dang / rdul phra mor smra ba'o// gzhan yang blo gros chen po
131a7(mdo sde): dngos po'i rang bzhin bdun yod de// 'di ltar 'du ba dngos po'i rang bzhin dang / dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi dngos po dang / mtshan nyid kyi dngos po dang / 'byung ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi dngos po dang
131a8(mdo sde): rgyu'i dngos po dang / rkyen gyi dngos po dang / 'grub pa'i dngos po ste bdun no// blo gros chen po gzhan yang don dam pa bdun ste/ 'di ltar sems kyi spyod yul dang / ye shes kyi spyod yul
131b1(mdo sde): lta ba gnyis kyi spyod yul dang / lta ba gnyis las 'das pa'i spyod yul dang / snang ba med pa'i spyod yul dang / sras kyi sa las 'das pa'i spyod yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so rang gis
131b2(mdo sde): rig pa'i spyod yul te/ 'di dag ni blo gros chen po 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi dngos po'i rang
131b3(mdo sde): bzhin dang / don dam pa'i snying po yin te/ dngos po'i rang bzhin dang / don dam pa'i snying po de dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang/ 
131b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten las 'das pa mchog gi chos rang dang spyi'i ma tshan nyid du gtogs pa rnams/ 'phags pa'i shes ra rab kyi spyan gyis rnam par 'god de/ ji ltar mu stegs byed pa'i
131b5(mdo sde): smra ba dang / lta ba ngan pa dang thun mong du mi 'gyur ba de ltar rnam par 'god do// blo gros chen po ji ltar mu steg/ sa byed pa'i smra ba dang / lta ba ngan pa dang thun mongs ma yin
131b6(mdo sde): pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ blo gros chen po rnam par shes pa rnams kyi bdag gi yul la rnam par rtog pa'i lta ba khong du ma chud pa dang / bdag gi sems snang ba tsam du mi 'jug pas/ byis
131b7(mdo sde): pa so so'i skye bo rnams dngos po dang / dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin don dam par lta ba gnyi su smra bar gyur to// blo gros chen po gzhan yang mi shes pa dang / sred pa dang las kyi rkyen rnam par
131b8(mdo sde): log pa/ rnam par rtog pa srid pa gsum gyi sdug bsngal rnam par zlog pa rang gi sems snang ba'i yul ni sgyu ma rje su mthong bar bshad par bya'o// blo gros chen po dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze gang
132a1(mdo sde): la lamabyung ba'am/ yong pa rgyu las 'bras bu mngon pa dang / dngos po yun du gnas pa dang / rkyen rnams las phung po dang / khams dang skye mched rnams skye ba dang / 
132a2(mdo sde): gnas pa dang / byung nas kyang 'jig par 'dod de/ blo gros chen po de dag ni rgyun dang / bya ba dang / skye ba dang / srid pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang / lam dang / las dang / 'bras bu dang / 
132a3(mdo sde): bden pa dang / rnam par 'jig pa dang / chad par lta bar 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mngon sum dang / mi dmigs pas/ thog ma mthong ba med pa'i phyiraro// blo gros chen po 'di lta ste/ gyo mo na
132a4(mdo sde): rdza ma med pa las rdza ma'i bya ba mi byed do// sa bon tshig pa/ yang myu gu'i bya ba mi byed do// blo gros chen po de bzhin du phu nga po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi dngos pod de dag 'gag
132a5(mdo sde): pa dang / 'gag pa dang / 'gag par 'gyur ba ni bdag ni sa rnams snang ba rnam par rtog pa'i mthong ba'i rgyu las byung bas// de dag ni rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba med do// blo gros
132a6(mdo sde): chen po gal te ma byung ba 'am/ yod pa las rnam par shes pa rnam gsum phrad pa'i rkyen gyi byed pa ldan pa las 'byung du zin na ni/ blo gros chen po rul sbal gyi spu lta bu med pa rnams/ bye ma lnga
132a7(mdo sde): kyang 'bru mar 'byung bar 'gyur ro// blo gros chen po yod pa dang / med par 'byur bar smra ba la dam bcas pa nyams pa dang / nges pa las 'gal ba dang / bya ba dang / las dang / byed pa don med par
132a8(mdo sde): yang 'gyu ro// blo gros chen po de dag la yang gsum phrad pa'i rkyen gyis byed pa dang / ldang bas rgyu dang 'bras bu dang / rang gi mtshan nyid du ston pa yod de/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang
132b1(mdo sde): da ltar byung ba'i yod pa dang / med pa'i mtshan nyid yod par rig pa dang / gzhung gi brtag pa'i sa la gnas shing / rang gi lta ba nyes pa'i bag chags kyis ston te/ blo gros chen po de ltar byis pa so so/ 
132b2(mdo sde): skye bo rnams nyes pa'i lta bas zin pa mi mnyam pa'i blo can rnams mi shes pas bstan pa la thams cad mkhyen pas bstan to zhes zero// blo gros chen po dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze gang la la rang
132b3(mdo sde): bzhin med pa/ sprin dang 'gal me bskor ba dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / ma skyes pa dang / sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu'i zla ba dang / rmi lam dang / phyi rol du sems kyi snang ba rnam par rtog pa dang / 
132b4(mdo sde): thog ma med pa'i dus kyi spros pa mthong bas/ rang gi sems kyi snang ba rnam par rtog pa'i rkyen gyis/ phyi rol ldog pa med dab/ yongasu brtags pa'i brjod pa yang mtshan gyi gzhi
132b5(mdo sde): dang / brjod par bya ba dang bral ba/ lus dang / longs spyod dang / gnasu snang ba'i kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang / yul dang / gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / rnam
132b6(mdo sde): par bral ba snang ba med pa'i spyod yul skye ba dang / gnas pa dang / 'jig pa spangs pa/ bdag gi sems skye ba dang ldan pa rnam par sgoms par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'
132b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po de dag ni ring por mo thogs par 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa mnyam pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro// blo gros chen po snying rje chen po dang thabs la mkhas pa lhun
132b8(mdo sde): gyis grub par gyur pa'i spyod pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad sgyu ma dang / gzugs brnyan dang mnyam pa nyid dang / rkyen gyis ma brtsams pa/ phyi nang gi yul rnam
133a1(mdo sde): par dben pa dang / sems kyi phyi rol tu lta bas/ mtshan ma med par byin gyis brlabs dang / ldan pa rnams/ rims kyis sa'i rims pa ting 'dzin gyi yul la
133a2(mdo sde): rje su 'jug pa dang / khams gsum bdag gi sems sgyu mar shin tu sgom pas sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob par 'gyuraro// bdag gi sems snang ba med pa tsam la 'jug pas/ shes rab
133a3(mdo sde): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ rje su thob par skye ba dang / bya ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'i gzugs lta bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i rje su song ba/ de
133a4(mdo sde): bzhin nyid kyi sprul pa dang ldan pa/ stobs dang / mngon pa/ re shes pa dang / dbang dang / snying brtse dang / snying rje/ dang / thabs kyis brgyan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
133a5(mdo sde): zhing gi mu stegs can gyi gnasu nye bar 'gro ba/ sems dang / yid dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/ rim sa kyis gnas 'phos pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rab
133a6(mdo sde): tu thob par 'gyuraro// blo gros chen po de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i rjesu 'brang ba rab tu thob pa rnams kyis/ phung po dang / khams dang / 
133a7(mdo sde): skye mched dang / sems dang / rgyu dang / rkyen dang / bya ba dang ldan pa dang / skye ba dang / gnas pa dang / 'jig par rnam par rtog pa'i spros pa dang bral bar/ sems tsam gyis rje su 'brang bar bya'o// 
133a8(mdo sde): thog ma med pa'i dus kyi spros pa'i gnas ngan len gyi bag chags las byung ba'i srid pa gsum po rab tu mthong nas/ sangs rgyas kyis snang ba med pa/ mi skye ba dran pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa so sorang
133b1(mdo sde): gi chos rtogs par khong du chud pas/ bdag gi sems la dbang bsgyur zhing lhun gyis grub pa'i spyod pa rtogs par khong du chud pas/ gzugs sna tshogs kyi nor bu dang 'dra ba/ shin tu phra zhing
133b2(mdo sde): sems can gyi sems kyi rje su 'jug pa'i sprul pa'i gzugs dang / sems tsam du 'jug pas/ sa'i rim pa'i mtshams sbyor ba 'brel bar rab tu 'jog par 'gyuraro// blo gros chen po
133b3(mdo sde): de bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag gi grub pa'i mtha' la mkhas par bya'o// de nas yang blo gros chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems dang / yid
133b4(mdo sde): dang rnam par shes pa dang / chos lnga dang / rang bzhin gyi ma tshan nyid sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnamadas rje su dong ba/ bdag gi sems snang ba'i spyod yul dang / 
133b5(mdo sde): rnam par bral bar byed pa brjod pa dang / rigs pa dang / de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid rnam par 'jig pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rab kyi snying po chos kyi rnam grangs
133b6(mdo sde): kyi me tog bshang du gsol/ lang ka'i grong rdal dang / ma la ya'i rgya mtsho la gnas pa'i byang chub sems rnams kyi slad du/ kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul rgya mtsho'i brlabs lta bu/ 
133b7(mdo sde): chos kyi sku de bzhin gshegs pas rjesu gsungs pa bsha du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
133b8(mdo sde): blo gros chen po mig gi rnam par shes pa ni rgyu bzhi dag gis 'byung ngo // bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rang gi sems snang ba la 'dzin par khong du ma chud pa dang / thog ma med pa'i dus nas
134a1(mdo sde): rnas pa gnas ngan lam ga gas pam gachags pa mngon par zhen pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang banan kyang ba nyid dang / gzugs snang brnams
134a2(mdo sde): kyi mtshan nyid la ngo mtshar du 'dzin pa yin te/ blo gros chen po rgyu bzhi po 'di dag gis kun gzhi rnam par shes pa chu klung lta bu las 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rlabs 'byung ngo // blo gros
134a3(mdo sde): chen po mig gi rnam par shes pa la ji lta ba bzhin du/ dbang po thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang / spu'i khung bu rnams la yang de bzhin te/ me long la gcig char dang / rims kyis
134a4(mdo sde): yul gzugs snang ba dang / rgya mtsho la rlung gis btab dpa bzhin du/ blo gros chen po yul gyi rlung dang / sems kyi rgya mtsho'i rlabs rgyu'i bya ba rgyun ma chad pa'i mtshan
134a5(mdo sde): nyid gcig dang tha dad pa las rnam par grol ba/ las dang / rigs dang / mtshan nyid dang shin tu 'bral ba'i rang ba zhin ngo bo nyid khong du mi chud pa rnam par shes pa'i tshogs
134a6(mdo sde): lnga 'jug/ blo gros chen po rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po de dag dang lhan cig du rgyu dang / yul bye brag 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid khong du chud par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa
134a7(mdo sde): de dag gi rgyu las byung ba'i bdag nyid rab tu 'jug ste/ de dag dang de 'di snyam du bdag cag ni lhan cig du phan tshun rgyur gyur cing / rang gi sems snang ba'i rnam par rtog pa la mngon
134a8(mdo sde): bar zhen pas zhugs pa'o snyam du mi semaso// 'on kyang phan tshun tha mi dad pa'i mtshan nyid du lhan cig rnam par rig pa'i yul bye brag 'byed pa la 'jug ste/ de ltar 'jug pa'i tshe mnyam
134b1(mdo sde): par bzhag pa'i rnal 'byor can gyis kyang / ji ltar shin tu phra bar rgyu ba'i bag chags 'jug pa rnams mi shes par rgyu'o// rnal 'byor can rnams ni/ 'di ltar bdag cag rnam par shes pa
134b2(mdo sde): rnams bkag nas snyoms par 'jug go snyam du sems kyang de dag ni rnam par shes pa ma 'gags bzhin du snyoms par 'jug ste/ bag chags kyi sa bon ma 'gags pa'i phyir ni ma 'gags pa'o// 
134b3(mdo sde): yul la 'jug cing 'dzin pa med pas ni 'gag so// blo gros chen po kun gzhi rnam par shes pa rgyu zhing 'jug pa/ de ltar shin tu phra bas de bzhin gshegs pa dang sa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub
134b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams ma gtogs par gzhan nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / mu stegs can gyi rnal 'byor gyi// rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis khong du chud pa'am/ ting nge
134b5(mdo sde): 'dzin dang shes rab kyi stobs kyis kyang rtogs par sla ba ma yi no// blo gros chen po gzhan du na/ sa'i mtshan nyid dang / shes rab dang / ye shes la mkhas shing tshig rab tu phye ba
134b6(mdo sde): la rnam par gdon mi za ba/ rgyal ba rnams la mtha' yas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bstsags pa/ rang gi sems snang ba la rnam par rtog pa'i spros pa dang bral ba/ nags tshal stug po dang / phug dang
134b7(mdo sde): shing khrod na gnas shing rnal 'byor rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma la rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rang gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa snang ba'i rgyud mthong ba dang / zhing mtha' yas pa'i rgyal ba rnams
134b8(mdo sde): kyis dbang bskur ba dang / dbang dang / stobs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang thob par nus// blo gros chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi skye bo la ri mor byas
135a1(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis sems dang / yid dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa rang gi sems snang ba'i rang bzhin gyi spyod yul rnam par rtog pa'i 'khor ba sring ba'i rgya mtsho las dang se
135a2(mdo sde): pa dang / mi shes pa'i rgyu las byung ba las rgal bar nus so// blo gros chen po de'i phyir rnal 'byor can gyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi skye bo dang bsten pa'i nan tan brtsam par bya'o// de nas de'i
135a3(mdo sde): tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs rnams// rlung gi rkyen gyis byung ba dag/ gar cing rab tu byung ba ni// rgyun kyang rnam
135a4(mdo sde): par 'chad pa med// kun gzhi chu bong bzhin du/ rtag tu yul gyi rlung gis bskyod// sna tshogs rnam shes dba' rlabs rnams// gar cing rab tu 'byung
135a5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur// sngon po dmar po lan n+da dag/ dung / dang 'o mkhar dang // bska ba'i 'bras bu me tog dang // ji ltar nyi zla'i 'od zer dang // rgya mtsho yi ni dba' rlabs
135a6(mdo sde): dag mi gcig tha dad min par shes// de bzhin rnam shes bdun po dang // sems dang lhan cig ldan pa'o// rgya mtsho yongasu gyur pa ni// dba' rlabs sna tshogs de dag ste/ 
135a7(mdo sde): rnam par shes shes bya ba yi// kun gzhi de bzhin sna tshogs 'byung // sems dang yid dang rnam shes pa// mtshan nyid don du rab tu brtag/ brgyad po tha dad ma yin mtshan// 
135a8(mdo sde): mtshan gyi gzhi dang mtshan nyid med// rgya mtsho dang ni dba' rlabs rnams// ji ltar khyad par med pa bzhin// sems dang rnam shes de bzhin du// yongasu gyur pa mi rnyed // sems/ 
135b1(mdo sde): ni las rnams sogs par byed// yid kyang rnam par sogs pa ste// rnam par shes pas rnam par rig/ lnga po snang la rtog par byed// sngon po mar ba'i rnam par ni// mig gi/ 
135b2(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa gda'// dba' rlabs sems dang 'thun pa'i chos// ci slang thub chen bshad du gsol// sngon po mar po'i rnam pa rnams// dpa' rlabs dag la ma mchis te/ 
135b3(mdo sde): mtshan nyid don du byis pa la// sems kyi 'jug pa bshad pa'o// de la 'jug pa med pa ste// rang gi sems ni gzung ba spangs// gzung ba yod na 'dzin pa yang // dba' rlabs/ 
135b4(mdo sde): mthun par grub par 'gyur// lus dang longs spyod ga/ nas lta bur// mi'i rnam par shes pa snang // de phyir de yi 'jug pa ni// dba' rla brang/ dang 'dra bar snang // 
135b5(mdo sde): dba' rlabs dngos por rgya mtsho ni// gar byed rnam pa rig 'gyur na// kun gzhi 'jug pa de bzhin du//  phyir na blos mi rig/ byis pa blo dang mi ldan pas// kun gzhi
135b6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho ci bzhin du// dpa' rlabs 'byung ba'i chos 'thun phyir// dpa yis nye bar sbyar ba yin// skye bo bzang ngan bar ma la// gdugs 'char 'gyur ba ji bzhin du// de bzhin 'ji
135b7(mdo sde): rten sgron ma khyod// byis pa rnams la yang dag ston// chos la rab tu bzhugs mdzad cing // ci slad de bzhin nyid kyi gsungs// nga sde de bzhin nyid gsungs na// sems la
135b8(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid ma mchis// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs dang // me long rmi lam ji bzhin du// tshig cha'i dus su snang ba bzhin// sems kyang rang gi spyod yul la// yul dang / 
136a1(mdo sde): par mi ldan pas// rims kyis 'jug par rab tu 'byung // rnam par shes pas rnam par rig/ yid kyis de bzhin snyems par byed// lnga po rnams la
136a2(mdo sde): snang bar mngon// tshogs par gyur la rim pa med// ri mo'amakhan po la la'am// ri mo mkhan gyi slob ma'ang rung // ri mo'i don du tshon 'gyed pa// bshad pa 'di yang de dang / 
136a3(mdo sde): 'dran tshon la ri mo yod pa min// pir dang snod la'ang de bzhin med// sems can drang ba'i don gyi phyir// tshon gyis ri mo rnam par brtag/ yang dag la ni yi ge med// bshad
136a4(mdo sde): pa dag ni 'khrul pa'o// chos rnams la ni gnas bcas shing // rnal 'byor can la yang dag bstan// so so// rang rig yang dag ni// brtag dang rtog pas shin tu spangs
136a5(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sras la 'di bstan gyi// byis pa rnams la ba sha nga ma yin// ji ltar sgyu ma sna tshogs dag/ snang yang yod pa ma yin te// de bzhin bshad pa sna tshogs kyang // 
136a6(mdo sde): bshad pa rnam par 'khrul pa yin// gzhan la gang zhig bstan pa de// gzhan la bshad par mi rung ste// ji ltar nad pa sau la// sman pa sman rnams gtong ba ltar// sangs rgyas de
136a7(mdo sde): bzhin sems can la// sems tsam du yang rab tu gsungs// mgon po rnams ni gang gsungs pa'i// so so rang rig spyod yul ni// rtog ge can gyi yul ma yin// nyan thos rnams/ 
136a8(mdo sde): kyi'ang de bzhin min// blo gros chen po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rang gi sems snang ba'i gzung ba 'dzin pa la rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul yongasu shes par 'dod pas// 'du ba
136b1(mdo sde): 'du 'dzi dang / gnyid dang / sgrib pa med par bya'o// srod dang / tho rangs dang / nam gyi gung la mi nyal ba'i sbyor ba la brtson par bya'o// mu stegs can dang / ngan pa'i gtsug lag dang / gtam
136b2(mdo sde): dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi sems snang ba la rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid khong du chud
136b3(mdo sde): pa rtogs par bya'o// gzhan yang blo gros chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos// sems dang / shes rab dang / ye shes kyi mtshan nyid rnam par dgod pa la gnas te/ gong
136b4(mdo sde): du 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid gsum la brtson pa/ dar bya'o// de la blo gros chen po gong du 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ snang ba med pa'i
136b5(mdo sde): mtshan nyid dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang gi smon la ma gyi byin gyis brlabs kyi mtshan nyid dang / 'phags ba'i so so rang gi ye shes kyi mtshan nyid de/ de dag khong du
136b6(mdo sde): chud pas rnal 'byor can/ bong bu theng po lta bu/ sems dang / shes rab dang / ye shes kyi mtshan nyid spangs te/ rgyal ba'i sras kyis sa brgyad pa thob nas/ de'i gong du mtshan nyid gsum
136b7(mdo sde): la brtson par byed do// de la blo gros chen po thams cad snang ba med pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / mu stegs can gyi mtshan nyid yongasu 'dris pa las 'byung ngo //
