315b6(mdo sde): rnam grangs bstan pa 'di ni/ a la la rmad du byung ba chen po lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa 'di ni/ a la la bdud rtsi chen po lag so// bcom
315b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa 'di ni/ a la la sman pa'i rgyal po chen po lta bu lag so// tha na dud 'gro'i skye gan su skyes pa yang rung ste/ gang dag gi rna lam du chos kyi rnam
315b8(mdo sde): grangs 'di grag par gyur pa de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po'i tshogs bstsags bdag ste/ sems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa lags/ sangs rgyas thams cad/ 
316a1(mdo sde): / ba dang ldan pa lags/ skye bo mang po la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis pa lags/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa lag so// de dag las kyi sgrib pa de yongasu dag nas dud 'gro'i yul de las yod
316a2(mdo sde): su thar te/ mi'i lus thob par 'gyur zhing / thob nas kyang tshe rabs snga ma dran te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'cha
316a3(mdo sde): ba de dang der skye bar 'gyur na/ mir gyur nas thos pa rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni de ltar sems can rnams kyi don chen
316a4(mdo sde): po lag so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag chos kyi rnam grang ngas 'di thos pa'i sems can de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nges pa'i tshogs la
316a5(mdo sde): gnas par 'gyur ba legs te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'a des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongasu bzung / 
316a6(mdo sde): myur du bla na med pa yang dag dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa leg so leg so// byam
316a7(mdo sde): pa khyod kyi ji skad smras pa de ni de bzhi no// de ni bde no// de ni kho na'o// de ni ma nor ba'o// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di the tshom dang bcas pas thos pa'i sems can de dag kyang
316a8(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa ma yin na/ gang dag the tshom med par nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rgya cher yang dag par
316b1(mdo sde): lta smos kyang ci dgos/ mdo sde 'dzin pa de lta bu de dag la bdud kyi las 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// de dag la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / ser sna dang / 
316b2(mdo sde): khro ba dang / gnod sems kyis gnod par mi 'gyuraro// de'i lus la rims nad dam nad 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// yul gang na mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa dang / chos smra ba gnas/ 
316b3(mdo sde): pa'am/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di glegs bam du bris te/ yod pa'i yul der nad dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 
316b4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' se/ mas dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol/ to// bcom ldan 'das slang ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga
316b5(mdo sde): brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dus la ba cing / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'jig par 'gyur ba'i 'dzi gas pa chen pos 'jigs pa'i dus la bab pa na/ bdag
316b6(mdo sde): gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di skye bu dam pa de dag la rab tu bstan par bgyi'o// de dag la gzi byin brtsal bar bgyi'o// yul gang na mdo sde 'dzin pa de lta bu dag gnas pa'i yul der/ khad
316b7(mdo sde): gis dus ma lags pa'i gsor ba dang / dgung char dang / mu ge dang / blo nad yang ba dang / mings dang / yams kyi nad dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad rab tu
316b8(mdo sde): zhi bar bgyi'o// yul gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / glegs bam du bgyis pa'am/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags pa la mchod pa bgyid pa'i yul der bdag gi
317a1(mdo sde): byin gyi rlabs kyis pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad dang / chom rkun dang / srin po dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i yang ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gang dag na chos smra ba 'di ltas
317a2(mdo sde): dag dang / mdo sde 'di 'chang ba'i yul de bdag gis lo tog dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / me tog dang / lo ma dang / 'bras bu thams cad phun sum mchog pa dang / bde ba thams cad 'byung
317a3(mdo sde): bar byin gyis brlabs par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa khyod sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos yongasu
317a4(mdo sde): gzung ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi chu ral yongasu bskyang ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgos te seng ge/ de'i sgra bsgrags pa leg so leg so// chos kyi rnam grangs
317a5(mdo sde): 'di khyod la yongasu gtad kyis/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus la bab ci / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'jig par 'gyur la/ 'jigs
317a6(mdo sde): pa chen pos 'jigs pa'i dus la bab pa'i tshe/ khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can thams cad la bstan par bya'o// rab tu bsgrag par bya'o// skyes bu dam pa de dag gi
317a7(mdo sde): mos pa bskyed par bya'o// don dam pa'i chos nyid tshad mar byas la/ mngon par brtson pas las gzhan mi bya bar rab tu bsgrag par bya'o// don dam pa'i chos nyid kho na las brtsam
317a8(mdo sde): te dbang du byas la bstan par bya'o// ci nas kyang skyes bu dam pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji lta ba bzhin du phyin ci ma log par don rtogs par 'gyur ba de ltar bstan par
317b1(mdo sde): bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshalo// de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / skye dgu'i
317b2(mdo sde): bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jug tu phyin pa'i dus la bab par shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
317b3(mdo sde): byams pa la lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis mchod nas 'di
317b4(mdo sde): skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis sems can dang / ngag tu ma mchis pa rnams kyi don bgyis pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni a la la bdud rtsi brjod pa lag so zhes smras/ 
317b5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam gra/ ngas 'di lta bu thos par dkas/ khyod kyis chos kyi rnam
317b6(mdo sde): grangs 'di zung shig/ yi ge ra bris shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rna
317b7(mdo sde): grangs 'di bzung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
317b8(mdo sde): stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdud rtsi brjod pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ byams pas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
318a1(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ 
318a2(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phag
318a3(mdo sde): pa bdud rtsi brjod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzog s+ho// // chos kyi sgo mo// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gnas bshad le'u
318a4(mdo sde): bcu ste// // bam po dang po// sangs rgyas kyi bu thams cad thal mo sbyor la/ sangs rgyas thams ca/ da kyi tshul khrims chen po bshad pa/ sems thag pa nas
318a5(mdo sde): nyon cig/ mang po tshogs pa yid bsdus te/ nyon cig/ bdag la kun tu ltung ba yod par shes na/ mthol cha/ ngas byos shig/ mthol tshangs byas na bde bar 'gyur ro// / 
318a6(mdo sde): mthol tshangs ma byas na/ sdig phyir zhing zab tu skye'o// kun tu ltung ba med na/ ma smra bar 'khod cig/ kun kyang gtsang mar mngon no// legs pa chen po yod pa'i rnams dang / dge
318a7(mdo sde): bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa brtag par nyon cig/ sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyiraro// mchod rten las chos byed pa'i tshe/ so sor thar pa la btsun cing lci
318a8(mdo sde): ba dang / gus shing rin chen byos shig/ so sor thar pa zhes bya ba'i tshul khrims ni 'di yin no// tshul khrims 'di bzung na mun pa las snang bar phrad pa dang mtshung so// mi dbul
318b1(mdo sde): bo las nor chen po thob pa dang mtshungaso// nang pa sman snyed pa dang mtshungaso// brtson khri mon nas phyung ba dang mtshungaso// lam ring por song ba las slar 'khor ba dang mtshungs te
318b2(mdo sde): 'di ni kun gyi mkhan po chen po yin par mngon pas/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten na bzhugs pa dang ma mtshungs pa medado// 'jigs pa'i sems ni skye dga'/ dge ba'i sems ni gas
318b3(mdo sde): dka' bas na/ kha na ma tho ba las bsnyas te/ med snyam du byas na/ chu'i thigs pa chung mod kyi/ rgyun gyis na snod chen po gang ngo // yud tsam gyi bar du sdig byas pas na/ bstir
318b4(mdo sde): med pa'i sems can dmyal bar lhung // re shig mi'i lha sa stor na/ bskal pa khri'i bar du yang skur mi'i lu sa ma thob bo// ngar ba'i tshe mi sdod do// dper na ni rta rgyug
318b5(mdo sde): pa dang 'dra/ mi'i tshe yang rtag pa med de/ dpa' rgyal gyi chu 'bab pa bas kyang myur te/ de ring gson mod kyi/ sang gi gnya' yang dka'o// dbus kho na la bab kyis/ mang
318b6(mdo sde): po'i rnams so so nas sems gcig tu 'grus shing 'bogs pa btsal ba'i rigaso// bag byas le lo bla khyad dang / nyal ba dang / gnyid kyis log cing / rang nyams kyis yid mi
318b7(mdo sde): bya'o// mtshan zhing ni sems bsdus la/ rtag par dkon mchog gsum gzungasu bzung la/ phyal ba don med pa la/ nyon mongs ngal chad cing tshe phyi ma la yang rab tu 'gyod pa mthar ji'/ 
318b8(mdo sde): thob pa med par mi bya'o// mang po'i rnams gcig nas gcig tu tshul khrims 'di bzhin legs pa byos shig/ de'i tshe na sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ mang po'i phyir chub
319a1(mdo sde): gang ga'i brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyis brjod du med pa'i chos kyi sgo mo'i mdo phye ste// de'i nang nas sems kyi gnas spu nyag ma'i mgo snyed do// snga ma 'das pa'i sangs
319a2(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad la yang bshad do// da ltar gyi sangs rgyas la yang de bzhin ma chad do// ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la yang de bzhin du 'chad par 'gyur ro// dus gsum gyi byang
319a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' lobs pa dang / slob pa dang / slob par 'gyur ro// ngas bskal pa brgya'i bar du sems kyi gnas 'di byas pas na/ nga'i mkhan po rdzogs long spong ba'i sku zhes bya'o// 
319a4(mdo sde): khyed sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ngas bshad do cog gci dag nas gcig tu sems can thams cad la/ sem las kyi gnas la ma phye shig/ de nas pad+mo'i snying po'i
319a5(mdo sde): snod kyi khams na/ gnam gyi 'od lham me lhung nge ba'i se nga ge'i gdan gyi steng nas/ sangs rgyas rnam par sna nga mdzad kyis 'od btang ste/ 'og gi me tog stong gi thog
319a6(mdo sde): gi sangs rgyas la spyan te/ nga'i sems kyi gnas kyi chos kyi sgo mo'i le'u gzungasu zung la dang shig/ yang gcig nas gcig tu 'bum phrag brgya'i yang phrag stong gi shAkya thub pas/ 
319a7(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la mthar gyis nga'i yan chad kyi sems kyi gnas kyi chos kyi sgo mo'i le'u shad do// khyod la sogs pa sems gcig tu gzungasu zung la byos shig/ de na
319a8(mdo sde): me tog stong gi thog gi/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag brgya'i yang phrag stong gi shAkya thub pa/ pad+mo'i snod kyi khams na/ lham me lhang nge ba'i seng ge'i khri las langs te/ so so nas mchi
319b1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ phyir nur nas/ lus kun gyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od btang ste/ 'od kun gyi nang nas grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas byung ste/ gcig car grangs med pa'i me tog/ 
319b2(mdo sde): sngon po/ ser po/ dmar po/ dkar pos/ rdzogs long spyod pa'i sku sangs rgyas la yon tu gsol nas/ yan chad sems kyi phyi mo'i le'u bshad pa yang khong du chud nas so sor
319b3(mdo sde): pad+mo'i snod kyi khams kyi nang du nub ste/ rang bzhin gyis bskal pa/ stong pa nyid kyi nang du nub nas/ me tog gi 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin thog mar byung ba'i gnasu slar song ste/ 'dzam+bu'i
319b4(mdo sde): gling byang chub kyi shing drung du phyin nas/ rang bzhin gyi skal pa me tog 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin las byung ste/ gdodardo rje'i rgyal po'i gdan dang / 'od shin tu bzang ba'i khang
319b5(mdo sde): par 'dug nas/ phyogs bcu'i chos rgya mtsho dang mtshung sa pa bshad// de nas yang seng ge'i khri las langs te/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gnam gyi pho brang du phyin nas/ 
319b6(mdo sde): gral bcu'i chos bshad do// de nas zung ma'i gnam du phyin te/ la su bya ba bcu bshad// de nas yang khri las langs te/ rgyal chen ris bzhi'i gnam du phyin nas/ phyogs shing
319b7(mdo sde): lta ba bcu bshad do// de nas yang 'dug pa'i sa nas langs te/ 'phrul dga'i gnam du phyin nas/ bsam gtan mi 'gyur ba bcu bshad/ de nas yang 'dug pa'i sa nas langs te/ 
319b8(mdo sde): gnam bden gnam du phyin nas/ sa bcu'i chos bshad/ de nas yang bsam gtan gcig gi nang du phyin nas/ rdo rje bcu bshad/ de nas yang bsam gtan gnyis kyi nang du
320a1(mdo sde): phyin nas/ bzod pa bcu'i chos bshad/ de nas yang bsam gtan gsum gyi nang du phyin nas/ smon lam bcu bshad/ de nas yang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i nang chen
320a2(mdo sde): po che ba dbang mchog 'du mched gnam gyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin te/ nga'i thog ma phyi mo'i me tog sna tshogs kyi khams rdzogs long spyod pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sems kyi gnas
320a3(mdo sde): kyi chos kyi phyi mo'i le'u bshad pa bshad// gzhan 'bum phrag brgya'i yang phrag stong gi shAkya thub pa yang de bzhin te/ gnyi su med do// tha dad pa yang medo// bsam gtan bskal pa'i
320a4(mdo sde): le'u'i nang nas kyang zhib du bshad// de'i tshe shAkya thub dpa pad+mo'i me tog snod kyi khams kyi shar phyogs naHnas/ lding pa'i khang bu'i nang du zhugs bdud kyis chos
320a5(mdo sde): gnos pa bzhin du bshad zin nas/ yas babs te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi ka phyi lar skyes nas/ yum gyi mtshan ni lha mdzes chen mo// yab kyi mtshan ni zas gtsang
320a6(mdo sde): mang bdag gi ming ni si ta ra zhes bya ste/ lo bdun na rab tu byung // lo sum cu nas sangs rgya su phyin nas/ nga'i mtshan ni shAkya thub pa zhes bya ste/ mi 'gyur ba'i gtsang ma'i sar rdo rje'i
320a7(mdo sde): me tog gi khri la 'dug nas/ dbang ba'i chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin te/ de'i nang gi 'dug pa bcu'i gnas mthar gyis bshad/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyis rus gtsang ma
320a8(mdo sde): chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal po// dra ba'i rgyal mtshan mthong ba'i phyir/ grangs med pa'i khams dper na dra ba'i bu gu dang mtshungs par bshad na/ khams gcig nas gcig so so'i mi
320b1(mdo sde): 'thun te/ tha dad pa'i grangs med do// sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi sgo mo bshad pa'ang de dang 'dra'o// ngas khams 'dir lan brgyad stong byin te/ khams 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i phyir/ dza
320b2(mdo sde): rje'i khri steng du 'jug ste/ dbang po chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal po pho brang du phyin nas/ de'i nang gi mang po thams cad sems kyi gnas kyi mdo phye'o// de nas gnas kyi pho brang nas mar
320b3(mdo sde): babs te/ 'dzam+bu'i gling gi byang chub kyi shing drung du phyin nas/ de'i sa'i steng gi sems can blun po ma rabs rnams kyi phyir thog ma phyi me rdzogs long spyod pa'i sku sangs rgyas kyis
320b4(mdo sde): sems kyi gnas nang bshad do// sems thog ma ga dayos pa ni/ rtag par 'od snang ba'i tshul khrims gcig kha ton tu klog/ rdo rje rin po che'i tshul khrims ni/ 
320b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi thog ma'i phyi mo yin no// byang chub sem sa dpa' thams cad kyi ni/ thog ma phyi mo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sa bon no// sems can thams
320b6(mdo sde): cad la yang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi skal pa yod// thams cad kyi shes pa dang / kha dog dang / sems dang / yid dang / sems cog thams cad kun kyang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo
320b7(mdo sde): nyid kyi nang du 'du so// tshul khrims kyi nang na rtag pa yun tu rtag par bsod nams yod do// rtag par yun tu rtag par chos kyi lus yod do// so sor thar pa 'di rnams bcu ni// 
320b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi dbyings nas/ chos kyi tshul khrims byas te/ dus gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyis gzungasu 'dzin to// ngas dmang po 'di'i phyir/ zad pa'i mtha' med pa'i
321a1(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi le'u bcu bslabs te bshad // rdzogs long spyod pang bdag ste// pad+mo'i dbus su gdod bzhugs nas/ mtha' bzhi'i me tog stong gi steng / shAkya thub pa stong du/ 
321a2(mdo sde): bzhugs/ me tog gcig khams 'bum phrag brgya// khams de gcig kyang sprul pa gcig/ kun kyang byang chub shing drung bzhugs// mnyam par sangs rgyas gan su son// de yang 'bum phrag/ 
321a3(mdo sde): brgya pa stong / rdzogs long spyod pa rang bzhin lus// sprul pa 'bum phrag brgya stong po// kun kyang rdul phran mang por 'dren// gcig car nga yi gan su 'ongs// sangs rgyas nga yi tshul
321a4(mdo sde): khrims nyon// zil dar sgo mo de nas bye// 'ung nas la dbu ma phrag brgya stong po// slad gtsang ma'i gan su phyi/ na// kun kyang byang chub shing drang bzhugs// nga yi mkhan
321a5(mdo sde): po tshul khrims kha don lhogs// tshul khrims chen po rtogs par lnga bcu brgyad// tshul khrims snang khyad gnyi zla bzhin// gcig tu nor bu yang nyo 'dra// byang chub
321a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' rdul phran bzhin// 'di yi yon gyis yang dag 'grub// gdod ma rdzogs long spyod pa nyid kyis klags// ngas kyang de bzhin kha thon klags// byang chub sems dpa'
321a7(mdo sde): gsar slob pa// glang la khyer zhing khrims bzung bzhin// thub bzhin gcig tu sems can ston// nga yi bde glags rtag par nyon// sangs rgyas chos rnams tshul khrims snod// so so
321a8(mdo sde): thar pa shes rab bzhin// mang po yid kun brtag par ches// khyed rnams sangs rgyas phyin par 'ong // nga yi sangs rgyas phyin zin kyang // rtag par 'di bzhin yid ches byed// tshul khrims
321b1(mdo sde): le'u kun chog chad yin/ yid sems yod pa thams cad ni// kun kyang sangs rgyas khrims kyis bsdu// sems can sangs rgyas khrims gnod pa// de nas sangs rgyas sa ru phyin// tshor che nas
321b2(mdo sde): dang mtshungs zin te// sangs rgyas kun gyi bu yang dag/ mang po kun gyis gus par byas// sems gcig brtul te nga glog nyon// de'i tshe na shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas// thog ma byang chub shing
321b3(mdo sde): drung bzhugs// bla na med pa'i g.yung drung rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo// byang chub sems dpa'i thog ma so sor thar pa'i mdud pa na/ pha ma dang / dge 'dun dang / dkon mchog gsum la sri zhu dang / 
321b4(mdo sde): yid dang mi 'gal bar bya'o// sri zhu byas te bla ma'i yid dang mi 'gal ba ni/ chos zab mor thub pa'i gzhung ste/ sri zhu'i ming ni tshul khrimaso// ming gcig tu ni sdom pa dang / 
321b5(mdo sde): gtong ba'o// de nas 'od snang ba grangs med pa 'byung ngo // de'i tshe/ 'bum phrag brgya stong mang po tshogs pa byang / chub sems dpa' rnams dang / gzugs yod pa'i khams
321b6(mdo sde): kyi gnas bco brgyad dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnam rim pa drug ming dang / rgyal po chen po rnams thal mo sbyar te/ soms gcig tu mnyan nas/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims
321b7(mdo sde): chen po klags te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ nga da ltar zla ba phyed phyed cing bdag gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kha ton tu klog go// khyed la
321b8(mdo sde): sogs pa thog ma sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang / kha ton tu lhogs shig/ sems g.yos te/ phyogs pa bcu dang / g.yo zhing bskyed pa bcu dang / 
322a1(mdo sde): rdo rje bcu dang / sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang kha ton tu lhogs shig/ lung ni tshul khrims kyi 'od kho nas byung ste/ rgyu yod rkyen med pa'i 'od ma yin te/ 
322a2(mdo sde): sngon po dang / dmar po/ ser po/ dkar po/ nag po yang ma yin/ kha dog kyang ma yin/ sems kyang ma yin/ yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin/ rgyu rkyen gyi chos kyang ma yin te/ sarba/ 
322a3(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyi ni gdod ma phyi mo// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ni lam gyi rtsa ba bas na/ mang po thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams kyi rtsa ba'i phyi mo zhes bya'o// 
322a4(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams kyis kyang / gzung dasu gzung ba'i rig so// legs par brlabs pa'i de rig so// sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams brtag par nyon cig/ 
322a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims nod na ni rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po che phra dang / dge slong pho mos dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi gnam bco brgyad dang / 'dod pa'i
322a6(mdo sde): khams rnam drug dang / gdol pa dang / nyid grub dang / pha g.yeng dang mo g.yeng dang bran pho smos dang / lha ma srin sde brgyad dang / phyag bsnyen dang / byol song dang / 'phrul zhing 'gyur ba'i
322a7(mdo sde): mi la sogs te/ chos kyi mkhan po'i tshig mda' phrad pa'i rnams thams cad tshul khrims mnod du rung ste/ kun kyang ming rab tu gtsang ma zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas kyis sangs
322a8(mdo sde): rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ so sor thar pa pas pham pa bcu yod do// sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims nos pa ni tshul khrims 'di kha ton tu ma klags na byang chub sems dpa' yang
322b1(mdo sde): ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi sa bon yang ma yin/ nga yang 'di bzhin du kha ton tu klog go// lobs zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / phyis slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams
322b2(mdo sde): cad dang / da ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ngas so sor thar pa'i gzungs kyi mdo tsam zhig bshad kyis/ bslab cing gzung su bzung ba'i rig so// sangs rgyas kyis
322b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ bdag gis bsad pa dang / mi gzhan gsod du bcug pa dang / thams cad kyis gsod pa la sdod pa/ gsod pa mthong na dga' bar sems
322b4(mdo sde): ga sngags dang / rngad mo byas te/ bsad pa/ bsad pa'i rgyu/ gsad pa'i rkyen/ bsad pa'i chos byed pa/ ga/ sod pa'i las byed pa la sogs te/ sems yod do cog
322b5(mdo sde): la ched kar gsad du mi rung / 'di lta ste/ byang chub se dpa' de ni rtag par snying rje ba dang / sro zhu che zhing mi 'gal ba'i sems rtag par g.yos te/ bags kyi
322b6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyir mda' dang / 'or pa bya ba'i rig so// bdag gis rang nyams byasas te/ snying tshim par sems can bsad na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bas
322b7(mdo sde): pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag gis ma byin par blangs sam/ pha log po ma byin par len tu bcug gam/ thabs kyis mkhyen par blangs sam/ ma byin par len pa'i hUM/ 
322b8(mdo sde): ma byin par len pa'i rkyen/ ma byin par len pa'i las byed pa/ sngags sbrum byas te/ nor khyer ba la sogs te/ lham srin dang / bdag po yod pa dang / yang kr-i'i nor rdzas dang / 
323a1(mdo sde): nor rdzas so cog la khab dang / rtsa nyag ma gcig la ngas ched kar ma byin par blangasu mi rung ngo // byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin skyed la/ sri zhu'i
323a2(mdo sde): yid dang mi 'gal zhing / byams shing snying rje bar byas te/ rtag par sems can no cog gi yon+ta na dang / bsod nams bskyed pa'i rigaso// de la slar log par mi'o nor rdzas ma byin
323a3(mdo sde): bar blangs na byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag ma tshangs par spyod dam/ gzhan yang mi tshangs par spyod par bstan nas/ bud med de cog la ma tshangs
323a4(mdo sde): par spyod par byed pa dang / gzhan la mi tshangs par spyod pa/ dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa'i rgyu dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa'i rkyen dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa'i chos byed pa dang / 
323a5(mdo sde): mi tshangs par spyod pa'i las byed pa dang / byol song dang / lha dang lha ma yin gyi bu mo la mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / chos dang 'gal ba'i mi tshangs par spyod na/ byang
323a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i ni sri zhu dang / mi 'gal ba'i sems kyi sems can thams cad thar pa'i ra mda' bya zhing / chos gtsang ma gzhan la sbyin pa'i rig so// de la slar mi'o cog la
323a7(mdo sde): mi tshangs par spyod pa bskyed de/ byol song dang / ma dang bu mo dang / sring mo la sogs te/ gnyen pa drug la mi tshangs par spyod pa byas te/ byams shing rje ba med na/ de ni byang chub
323a8(mdo sde): sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag gis brdzun byas sam/ pha rol po brdzun zer bar bstan tam/ thabs kyis brdzun byas pa dang / brdzun gyi rgyu byas pa dang / 
323b1(mdo sde): brdzun gyi rkyen byas pa dang / brdzun gyi chos byed pa dang / brdzun gyi las byed pa dang / mthong ba la me mthong zhes zer ma mthong ba la ni mthong zhes zer/ lus dang sems kyis brdzun
323b2(mdo sde): byas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ni rtag par tshig drang po skye zhing / gcig tu na sems can gyi tshig drang po bskyed pa yin na/ de la slar log pa'i sems can thams cad kyi tshig
323b3(mdo sde): mi drang ba dang / yon po la lta ba dang / yon po'i las byed par bskyed na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu smyo ba'i khu ba bdag 'tshong ngam/ pa log
323b4(mdo sde): po smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong bar bstan tam/ thabs kyis smyodas pa'i khu ba mchong ngam/ smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong ba'i rgyu byed dam/ spro ba'i khu ba 'tshong ba'i rkyen byed dam/ 
323b5(mdo sde): smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong ba'i chos byed dam/ spro ba'i khu ba 'tsho kha'i las byed pa la sogs to// smyo ba'i khu ba'o coga'atshong du mi rung / smyo ba'i khu ba'i rkyen gyisakha na ma
323b6(mdo sde): tho ba skye'o// byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad la snang zhing / thar pa'i shes rab bskyed pa'i rigs ni/ slar log par sems can thams cad kyi phyin ci log gi sems
323b7(mdo sde): bskyed na/ byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu rab tu byung ba dang sa/ ma byung ba dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma'i nyes pa
323b8(mdo sde): bdag gis 'phya su byas sam/ gzhan 'phyas byed par bstan nam/ 'phya ba'i rgyu byas sam/ 'phya ba'i rkyen byas sam/ 'phya ba'i chos dang / 'phya ba'i las byed na/ byang chub seMs
324a1(mdo sde): dpa na mur 'dug dang / theg pa chung ngu rnam gnyis byed pa'im// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi nang na chos ma yin/ tshul khrims ma yin nes per na/ rtag par snying rje ba skyed / 
324a2(mdo sde): ngan pa'i rnams theg pa chen po la yid dga'/ yid ches par bstan cing bslabs pa'i rigs na/ de na byang chub sems dpa' slar logs par sangs rgyas kyi chos la nyes shes
324a3(mdo sde): bshad na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu la la zhig bdag gis bdag bstod cing / par spod pa dang / gzhan la bdag bstod/ par spod par ston pa
324a4(mdo sde): smod pa'i rgyu/ spong ba'i rkyen byed pa/ spyod pa chos pa/ slong ba'i las byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' na/ sems can thams cad kyi sbyin par sma dpabacing / 
324a5(mdo sde): sems pa ni bdag gis blangs te/ dge slong legs pa/ gzhan la sbyin pa'i rigs na/ la la zhig gis pa ga gi legs pa ni bsnyad/ gnon gyi legs pa na ba
324a6(mdo sde): te gzhan la smad sma bab par byas na/ da ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag ser sna che'am/ gzhan ser sna che bar ston tam/ ser sna che ba'i rgyu byed
324a7(mdo sde): dam ser sna che ba'i rkyen byed dam/ ser sna'i chos byed dam/ ser sna'i las byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni dbul po 'ongs cog dang / gzhan ci 'dod pa bzhin dgongaso// byang chub sems
324a8(mdo sde): dpa'i sems la ngan tu sems shing / sems la gshe ba dang / dong tshe gcig gam/ khab gcig gam/ rtsa nyag ma gcig mi ster ram/ chos 'dod pa zhig 'ongs na/ tshig gcig
324b1(mdo sde): le'u gcig rdul tsam gyi chos kyang ma bshad la/ slar ngag ngan pas spyos te smra bab na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag khro 'am/ mi pha log po khro bar
324b2(mdo sde): ston tam/ khro ba'i rgyu byed dam/ khro ba'i rkyen byed dam/ khro ba'i chos byed dam/ khro ba'i las byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad kyi nang na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing / 'thab cing / 
324b3(mdo sde): rtsod pa med par byas la/ rtag par snying rje bskyed cing / bya ba'i rigs kyi phyir logs par sems can thams cad kyi nang na/ sems can ma yin pa la kha ngan pas gshe zhing / lag pas 'chog
324b4(mdo sde): pa dang / ral gri dang / dbyigs pas gdab cing / brdegs kyangadasnying rtse ma bris te/ pha log po 'gyod cing tshig 'jam podas 'chags shing / gnong par kyang khro ba'i 'dud pa makrolan
324b5(mdo sde): de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu la la zhig gis/ dkon mchog gsum la ma yin/ zhes zer ram/ gzhan dkon mchog gsum la ma yin
324b6(mdo sde): zhes zer bar bstan tam/ ma yin zhes zer ba'i rgyu dang / rkyen byed dam/ ma yin pa'i chos byed dam/ ma yin pa'i las byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni mur 'dug dang / ma rabs kyi nang
324b7(mdo sde): tshig gcig/ sangs rgyas kyi skad la yin zhes zer ba zhig mthong thos na mdung rtse gsum pa sum brgyas snying la zug pa dang / mtshungs na bdag gi kha nas ma yin zhes zer ba lta smos kyang
324b8(mdo sde): ci dgos te/ yid ches pa'i sems sri zhu dang / mi 'gal ba'i sems bskyed pa'i rigs na/ slar log par ma rabs log pa la la lta zhing / ma yin zhes zer ba'i grogs byed na/ de ni byang
325a1(mdo sde): / chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// dge bzhugs spyod pa'i rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i so sor thar pa 'di bslabs pa'i rig so// 'di'i nang nas rdul phra mo tsam yang
325a2(mdo sde): gzhig tu mi rung na/ tshul khrims bcu tshang bar zhig pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ la la zhig gis tshul khrims bshig pa zhig na/ da ltar gyi lus la byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa'i las
325a3(mdo sde): la ma nus te/ rgyal po'i gral yang stor/ 'khor lo bskor ba'i rgyal po'i gral yang stor/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma'i gral yang stor/ g.yos shing phyogs bcu dang / bskyed cing gsol/ 
325a4(mdo sde): ba bcu dang / chos rdo rje dang mtshungs pa bcu dang / sa bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid rtag pa/ yon tan zab mo la sogs pa zad par stor nas/ ngan song gsum du ltung ste/ 
325a5(mdo sde): bskal pa gnyis gsum gyi bar du pha ma dang / dkon mtshe ga gsum gyi ming mkhan kyang mi thos te/ de bas na gcig kyang ba zhig tu mi rung ngo // khyed la sogs pa byang
325a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' lobs pa dang / slob pa dang / slob par 'gyur ba'i rnams/ tshul khrims 'di bcu bslabs la gus par byos te/ rtag par gzungasu gzung ba'i rig so// gsal
325a7(mdo sde): bar ni le'u brgyad khri'i nang nas rgya cher bsha // sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ phas pham pa bcu ni bshad zin to// ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad ni/ 
325a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bu rgyal po'i gral thob pa'i tshe dang / 'khor lo bskor ba'i rgyal po'i gral thob pa'i tshe dang / blon po'i gral thob pa'i tshe dang / sngar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims
325b1(mdo sde): nod pa'i rig so// bung tang lham srin thams cad kyang / rgyal po'i lus dang / blon po'i lus kyi rim gro dang skyabs byedo// sangs rgyas thams cad kyang dgye so// tshul khrims thob zin na srinu
325b2(mdo sde): dang / mi 'gal ba'i sems dang / sems la gus par bya ba'i seMs dpa' bskyed de/ gral mthon po na 'dug pa'i mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / theg pa chen po la tshangs par spyod du
325b3(mdo sde): mtshungs pa dang / mtshungs par mthong ba dang / las 'thun par byed pa mthong na langs te/ bsu la phyag 'tshal te/ nang dri ba'i rig so// byang chub sems dpa' slar dregs pa'i sems dang le le'i/ 
325b4(mdo sde): sems dang / glen pa'i sems bskyed/ ma langs ma bsu/ phyag ma byas te/ ji la 'ang chos bzhin du rjes dang / ri ma dang / bdag gi lus dang / yul mkhar dang / phos mos
325b5(mdo sde): dang / nor rin po che bdun la sogs te nor ro cog btsongs la/ dgos so cog ma sbyar te/ de ltar na nus na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu la la ched dkar chang 'thung na chang
325b6(mdo sde): gi nyes pa skyes te/ dge ba'i bsod nams grangs med pa stor to// la la zhig gis bdag gi lus dang / lag gis chang snod blangs te/ mi pha rol po la byin te brud na/ tshe rabs lnga brgya'i/ 
325b7(mdo sde): bar du lags pa med par 'ongs na/ bdag 'thung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'di lta ste/ mi 'o cog thams cad dang / sems can thams cad la chang 'thung bar bstan tu mi rung ngo // bdag
325b8(mdo sde): rang 'thung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ bdag ched dkar 'thungs pa dang / pha rol po la bdar ba ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sha che dkar zos pa dang / sha'o cog bzar mi rung ste/ zos
326a1(mdo sde): na snying rje zhing byams pa'i rang bzhin gyi sa bon chad pas/ sems can thams cad kyis mthong na 'jigs nas spong ngo // de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi
326a2(mdo sde): sha bzar mi rung ngo // sha zos pa ni sdig grangs med de/ sha zos na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu rku ba rnam lnga gzar mi rung ngo // sgog pa dang / cong dang / rgya sgog dang / ri sgog rnams dang / 
326a3(mdo sde): shing kun dang / 'di rnams lnga/ kha zas so cog gi nang du bzar mi rung ngo // la la zhig ched kar zos na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sems can thams cad kyis tshul khrims brgyad dang / 
326a4(mdo sde): tshul khrims lnga dang / tshul khrims bcu dang / rtsa ba rna/ dam bzhi pashig pa dang / log pa bdun dang / gnod pa brgyad kyi tshul khrims bshig pa sdig byed pa mthong na/ 
326a5(mdo sde): mthol tshangs byed gzhug pa'i rig so// de las byang chu ba sems dpa' ma stan te/ mthol tshangs byed ma pa cug na// lhan cig 'dug 'dug cing / tshangs par spyod du
326a6(mdo sde): mtshungs pa'i dge 'dun gyi rnams gcig du tshogs te/ tshul khrims bshad pa'i tshe/ sdig dngosu byung gis/ nyes pa mthol tshangs byed du chug shig/ ma gtsug na ltung ba'o// 
326a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bu mkhan po theg pa chen po la lhan cig tu lta ba/ lhan cig tu las byed pa/ dge 'dun gyi khang khyim dang / mkhar du 'ongs pa mthong na/ rgyang grags stong gi lam na
326a8(mdo sde): tshur 'ongs na ni ba su/ 'gro ba na bskyal cing phyag 'tshal te/ bkur bsti dang / ri mo dang / nyin cig cing dus gsum du ri mo bya/ nyi ma gcig gi zan du gser srang gsum gyi kha zas
326b1(mdo sde): dang khri stan dang / chos kyi mkhan po ci 'dod do cog dgos kyang kun sbyor te/ byin la rtag par chos kyi mkhan po gnyer te/ dus gsum du chos bshad de nyin gcig cing dus gsum du byan/ 
326b2(mdo sde): gus par 'tshal la/ khro ba'i sems dang / mya ngan gyi sems mi skye bar bgyiso// chos kyi phyir lus dang / bsngos te chos gsol lo// de ltar ma byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu
326b3(mdo sde): gang la yang rung ste/ tshul khrims dang / mdo sde 'chad pa'i khang khyim chen po'i nang na/ chos 'chad pa yod na/ byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob pa tshul khrims kyi glegs bam khyer
326b4(mdo sde): te/ chos kyi mkhan po'i gan su song la/ gsol te dri ni mnod pa'i rig so// la la zhig ri dang / tshal dang / shing gri drung dang / dge 'dun gyis dang / khyim gyi nang dang / chos
326b5(mdo sde): 'chad do cog gi sar byin par byas te/ mnyan cing 'a do// de'i gan su song ste/ ma mnyan ma gnos na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bus sems ni theg pa chen po dang
326b6(mdo sde): 'gal zhing rtag par sangs rgyas kyi yi ge dang / tshul khrims la 'dug kyang / khar smran sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa ma yin zhes zer na/ rtag par theg pa chung ngu rnam gnyis dang // 
326b7(mdo sde): mur 'dug gi chos la lta zhing / log par lta ba'o cog gi tshul khrims dang / chos kyi yi ge gzungasu bzung na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu mi nad kyis btab pa cog rtag par rim gro
326b8(mdo sde): byas te gsos la sangs rgyas dang mtshungs par byas na/ dge ba'i bsod nams rnam pa brgyad kyi nang na/ nang pa la lta zhing gsos pa'i dge ba'i bsod nams ni bsod nams kyi dam par
327a1(mdo sde): pha ma dang / mkhan po dang / dge 'dun dang / slob ma 'am/ dbang po ma tshang ga nad do cog gis btab cing nyon mongs na/ kun kyang smos par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
327a2(mdo sde): can la lta gshe zhing / ngan sems kyis dge 'dun gyi khyim dang / yul mkhar du ma phyin pa/ dbye dang / ri lung dang / mkhar dang / tshal na nad pa 'dug pa mthong ste/ ra 'da' dang / rim gro ma
327a3(mdo sde): byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ral gri dang / mda' gzhu dang / mdung dang / stir la sogs te 'thab mo'i spyad mtshon cha dang / sems can gsod pa'i spyod dang 'dra ba/ rgya rgya mo la
327a4(mdo sde): sogs pa 'chang du mi rung ngo // byang chub sems dpa' ni// pha ma gzhan gyis gsad kyang sha mi glan na/ sems ca na thams cad gsad pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ mtshon cha
327a5(mdo sde): ched kar 'chang ba na ltung ba'o// 'di lta bu'i tshul khrim rnam bcu ni bslabs te/ rtag par gzungasu gzung ba 'i rig so// 'og ma le'u drug gi nang na rgya cher ba shad// sa
327a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bu khye 'dod pa'i phyir sems ngan pa bsams te/ nyi 'og gi yul du po nyar 'dul ba dmag gi g.yul bshams te
327a7(mdo sde): dmag bskyod nas 'thabs te/ sems can mang po bsad na/ byang chub sems dpa' dmag gi nang du song zhing phan tshun du 'drul yang mi rung na/ ched kar g.yul gyi dgra byed pa lta
327a8(mdo sde): smos kyang ci dgos/ de la ched kar byed pa ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bla 'bangs dang / bran pho mos dang / phyugs dag sna drug dang / gshin sgro ma ro bzhugs pa'i snod la sogs pa/ 
327b1(mdo sde): khe dang tshong spogs bdag gis kyang bgyi ba'i mi rigs na/ gzhan la byed par bstan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de la ched kar byed pa ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bus ngan sems
327b2(mdo sde): bskyed de/ ba log po dge ba des pa/ chos kyi mkhan po/ dge 'dun rgyal po/ ya rabs btsun pa la mnyes par log pa bdun dang / pham pa bcu dang / pha ma dang / bu pho nu bo dang / gnyen pa rnam
327b3(mdo sde): drug gi tshul khrims bshi go zhes bskur na/ sri zhu dang mi 'gal zhing / byams shing snying rje'i sems bskyed pa'i rigs kyi/ de la slar log pa'i gnod pa bskyed na mi bde ba'i gnas
327b4(mdo sde): su lhung na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskye/ dad/ ched kar me chen po btang la/ ri dang tshal dbye dang ri lung dang / dbyar zla ra ba man chad/ ston zla tha chungs yan
327b5(mdo sde): bsregs sam/ la la zhig gis me btang ste/ gzhan gyi khang khyim dang / mkhar dang / grong dang / dge 'dun gyi khyim dang / zhing dang skyed zhing dang / lha ma srin dang / bla'i
327b6(mdo sde): 'khor la sogs te/ bdag po yod do// cog gi nor rdzas bsreg tu mi rung // la la zhig gis ched kar bsregs na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi slob ma/ bdag dang
327b7(mdo sde): mur 'dug dang / gnyen rnam drug la sogs te/ dge ba'i bshes gnye no cog kun kyang / ci yang theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang / tshul khrims nod cing / gzungasu 'dzin par bstan
327b8(mdo sde): pa'i rigaso// gzhung dang lugs shes shing / byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa dang / bskyed cing gsol pa'i sems bcu dang / rdo rje'i chos kyi sems g.yo bar bstan
328a1(mdo sde): te/ gcig nas gcig tu go rims dang / chos kyi cho ga shes par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' la/ byang chub sems dpas ngan sems dang / zhe sdang bskyed de/ gzhan
328a2(mdo sde): nyan thos theg pa chung ngu rnams gnyis kyi tshul khrims dang / yi ge dang / mur 'dug dang / log par lta ba'i bshad pa bstan pa na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu legs pa'i sems
328a3(mdo sde): kyis/ sngar theg pa chen po'i go cha dang / tshul khrims dang / yi ge bslabs nas/ rgya cher phye nas gzhung gi ro ci bro ba shes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob pa rgyang grags
328a4(mdo sde): brgya stong gi lam nas/ theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang / tshul khrims 'dod cing 'ong ba mthong na/ chos kyi phyir/ dka' thub spyod pa chos bzhin bshad pa'i rig so// dka'
328a5(mdo sde): thub ces bya ba ni lus bsregs pa/ lag ngar bsre/ gas// sor mo bsregs pa'o// de la lus dang / lag ngar dang / sor mo bsregs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad la
328a6(mdo sde): yon tu ma gsol na/ de'i rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ma yino// stag dang sprang ki dang / seng ge ltogs pa la sogs pa dang / 'dre ltogs pa la sogs pa thams cad la lus
328a7(mdo sde): kyi sha dang / rkang lag pa gtong phod par byas te/ byin la de nas gcig nas gcig tu/ mthar gyis yang dag pa'i chos bshad de sems ni phye/ yid ni gol bar bya'o// de la byang chub
328a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' bdag gso ba'i khye 'dod pa'i phyir/ lan klan pa'i rigs pa ni ma blan gyi yi ge dang / tshul khrims ri mo dang / 'bru phyin ci log tu bshad nas/ snga phyi med par dkon
328b1(mdo sde): mchog la 'phya zhing 'chad pa ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag kha zas dang / nor rdzas dang / gso ba'i khye dang / mi snyan pa'i phyir/ rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po chen po la
328b2(mdo sde): sogs pa gnyen zhes zer te/ snyems shing nan gyis nor slong la/ gtsan ngag gis bsdigs te/ nan gyis nor dang / khye tshol lo cog gi ming ni ngan pa mang po che la zhes bya'o// 
328b3(mdo sde): gzhan la yang snying rje med cing / sri zhu dang / mi 'gal ba'i sems yong med par bstan pa ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu/ tshul khrims kha don tu klog pa slob na/ nyin gcig cing
328b4(mdo sde): dus drug tu/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bzung / de'i gzhung dang / don sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid shes par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi yon tan
328b5(mdo sde): tshig cig le'u gcig kyang mi shes par/ sgyu ma'i tshe ga tu nus zhes zer ba ni/ bdag la bsnyas shing bslu/ sa/ gzhan la yang bsnyas te/ chos so cog rnam pa gcig
328b6(mdo sde): kyang mi shes par/ gzhan la mkhan po byed cing tshul khrims ston pa ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed do// tshul khrims 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i lag na/ pog snod khyer/ 
328b7(mdo sde): ta byang chub sems dpa'i las byed pa la/ mthong nas phan tshun gnyis kyis rab tu da par bcug ste/ 'phags pa'i mi la bsnyas ma shin byed cing / ngan mi byed pa med do zhes
328b8(mdo sde): bskur te/ de lta bu ched kar byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu snying rje spyad de/ ci 'ang mi gsad par btang ba'i las byed cing / pho'o cog ni bdag gi pha yin/ mo'o cog ni
329a1(mdo sde): bdag gi ma yin bdag sngon chad kyi tshe rabs la gang skyes cog na yang / de dag las ma skyes pa med pas ni/ 'gro ba drug gi sems can bdag gi ba ma yin te/ de bsad cing
329a2(mdo sde): zos na/ bdag gi pha ma bsad do// gcig tu na bdag gi lus snyings pa bas do// sa dang chu thams cad ni bdag gi lus snga ma yino// me dang rlung ngo cog ni bdag gi gzugs kyi phyi
329a3(mdo sde): mo yin pas/ rtag par gson par btang ba'i las byed/ gar skyes gar skyes kyang sems can gsod pa mthong na thabs spyad de/ bdag gis 'or ba dang / ra 'da' byas te/ nyon mongs
329a4(mdo sde): shing 'phongs pa thar pa'o// rtag par byang chub sems dang nga'i tshul khrims bshad de bstan bslabs nas/ sem/ das can thar pa'i ra 'da' bya'o// pha ma dang / bu pho dang / nu
329a5(mdo sde): bo zhig shi na/ de nyin par chos kyi mkhan po gnyer te/ byad/ chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bshad na/ de'i bas danams kyis shi ba de/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang drad
329a6(mdo sde): mtho ri su skye'o// de ltar ma byas na ltung ba'o// chos kyi rgya mo// // bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o// 'di lta ste tshul khrims 'di bcu bslab na/ sems gus par gzungasu bzung ba'i
329a7(mdo sde): rig so// sdig bkru ba'i le'u yi nang nas kyang / tshul khrims gcig pu gcig pa nas rgya che zhing gsal bar bshad // sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ khros pa'i
329a8(mdo sde): lan khros pas mi glan/ brdeg pa'i lan brdeg pas mi glan/ pha ma dang / phu nu bo gnyen rnam drug bsad kyang sha glan du mi rung // gzhan zhig gis bdag gi rgyal po bsad kyang sha
329b1(mdo sde): glan du mi rung // srog gcad de sha glon na sri zhu'i tshe dang ngag lo// bran pho mo la ngag ngan pas spyos shing / brdegs la nyin gcig ngan pa rnam gsum bskyod pa la yang sdig grangs med na/ 
329b2(mdo sde): dgang lag pa sna bdu kyi sna bdun gyi sdig byas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la snying rje med/ gnyen rnam drug la sogs pa'i sha glan pa ched dkar byed
329b3(mdo sde): na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu gdod ma dang po rab tu byung ste/ ji'ang mi shes par/ bdag dbang po rno la 'dzangs pa rlom zhing / la la ni la grangs rgan zhing phyug gtsan pa bsnyems te/ 
329b4(mdo sde): la la rus che zhing thabs mtho ba dang / mang du shes pa dang / dbang che ba dang / nor rin po che sna bdun mang du bdog pas rgyag dregs snga chad chos shes pa'i mkhan po la yi ge
329b5(mdo sde): dang tshul khrims mi gsol/ mi nod/ tshad kyi mkhan phra la la ni rung chung / la la ni nas gzhon/ la la ni thabs chu// la la ni dbul/ la la ni dbang po mtshang yang legs
329b6(mdo sde): pa'i chos dben pa yod de/ chos kyi yi ge dang / tshul khrimaso cog zad par shes na/ byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob po// chos kyi slob dpon ma rigs pa dang / thabs la 'bral gang
329b7(mdo sde): du bltas shing / chos kyi mkhan po la yang dag pa'i bden pa gzhung ngo cog gsol zhing / don du ma 'ongs na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu/ sangs rgyas 'das pa'i phyi na/ sems dge bas
329b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims 'dod cing nod na/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar/ bdag gi sems la yid dam bcas te/ zhag bdun gyi bar du/ sang rgyas
330a1(mdo sde): kyi spyan sngar mthol tshangs byas la/ ltas bzang po mthong ba ni tshul khrims thob bo// ltas bzang po ma mthong na ni/ zhag bdun gnyis bdun gsum/ lo gcig gi bar du/ ltas
330a2(mdo sde): bzang po mthong ba'i drod kyis bzung ngo // ltas bzang po mthong nas/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar/ tshul khrims mnod do// ltas bzang po ma mthong / 
330a3(mdo sde): na/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spya na sngar/ tshul khrims gnod kyang / ming tshul khrim thob bo zhes mi bya'o// la la zhig gis sngon chad byang chub sems
330a4(mdo sde): dpa'i tshul khrims mnos pa'i mdun du nod na/ lta das bzang po mi dgo so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi mkha ngan po gcig nas gcig tu bstan pas na/ ltas bzang po
330a5(mdo sde): mi dgos te/ chos kyi mkhan po de'i 'dun du tshul khri mas mnos na tshul khrims kyang thob ste/ gus pa'i se mas skye'o// rgyang grags stong la mtshun chad/ tshul khrims
330a6(mdo sde): sbyin nus pa'i mkhan po med la/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar/ tshul khrims nod na/ ltas bzang po mthong bar dgo so// chos kyi mkhan po la
330a7(mdo sde): la zhig bdag theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang tshul khrims shes pa dang rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po rnams byams shing / 'dza' ba bsnyems te/ byang chub sems dpa' gsar du
330a8(mdo sde): slob pa/ chos kyi yi ge'i lugs dang / tshul khrims kyi gzhung 'drir 'ongs pa la brnyas pa'i sems dang / ngan pa'i sems dang / le lo'i sems kyis/ gcig pu gcig pu nas/ 'dri sa
330b1(mdo sde): lanam blan na ltung ba'o sangs rgyas kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / tshul khrims kyi yi ge dang / theg pa chen po'i drang ba'i chos/ drang por mthong ba/ drang po'i ngo bo nyid/ drang po'i chos kyi lus
330b2(mdo sde): kyis 'grus par slob cing spyod sgom mi nus pa rnams ni/ dkon mchog bdun bdun btang ste/ slar log par bltas te/ theg pa chung ngu ba rnam gnyis dang / mur 'dug gi chos dang / 
330b3(mdo sde): ma rabs kyi gzhung la bsten pa dang / a bi la dar ma bshad pa/ slob pa dang / theg pa chu ngu'i yi ge dang / 'dug par slob na/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sa bon chad pas lam 'gog
330b4(mdo sde): bas bsgribs pa'i rgyu rkyen gyis/ byang chub sems da pa'i lam ma yino// de lta bu tshad kar byas na ltung ba'o// sa ngas rgyas kyi bu/ sangs rgyas 'das pa'i phyin/ chos 'chad pa bdag
330b5(mdo sde): po byed pa dang / dge 'dun gyi khyim bdag po dang / ston cing 'phrul pa'i bdag po dang / bsam gtan tu 'jugapa'i bdag po dang / 'gro zhing 'ongs pa'i bdag po dang / de lta bu
330b6(mdo sde): byed na byams pa'i sems bskyed la/ mi mdza' ste 'thab cing rtsod pa yang / dge bar bsdum pa'i rigs/ dkon mchog gsum gyi nor yang dge bar bsrungs te/ ma 'ongs par mi spyad
330b7(mdo sde): bdag gis bdag gi skor bab pa dang / mtshungs par bya'o// de la las logs par mang po 'grub cing 'bad pa dang / rang nyams kyi sems kyis/ dkon mchog gsum gyi nor spyad na/ 
330b8(mdo sde): ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sngan chad dge 'dun gyi khyim gyi nang na 'dug la/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge slong 'dren pa zhig phyis dge 'dun gyi khang khyim dang / mkhar dang / grong
331a1(mdo sde): / dang rgyal po'i khyim dang / dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i tshe dang / 'khor gyi nang du 'ongs pa mthong na/ snga na 'dug pa'i dge 'dun gyis na ni/ kha su/ 'gro na ni bskyal te/ zas kyi sti
331a2(mdo sde): stang dang / kham khyim dang / nyal ba'i mal cha dang khri dang / sna sna nas sbyar te sbyino// la la zhig bdag la nor med na/ bdag gis lus dang / bu pho dang / bu mo dang / btsongs te ci 'dod
331a3(mdo sde): pa kun sbyar te sbyin dgos te/ sbyin bdag la la zhog 'ongs te/ dge 'dun pha la dang / dge 'dun gyi 'dron pa zhig gnyer te/ yon gyi nor skal ba yod pa'i sar/ dge 'dun gyi khyim ba
331a4(mdo sde): pos/ dge 'dun 'dron pa'i rnam rig kyis gnyer ba tang ste/ de las dge 'dun snga nas 'dug pas/ bdag 'ba' shig gnyer bar song ste/ dge 'dun 'dron pa ma
331a5(mdo sde): btang na/ dge 'dun gyi khyim gyi bdag po sdig grangs med par thob ste/ byol song dang mtshungaso// dge sbyong ma mi na/ shAkya'i rigs kyi sa bon yang ma yin te/ de ltar byas
331a6(mdo sde): na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ci yang go rim su ma bab par/ logs shig tu yon blangs shing / bdag gir bkur du mi rung ngo // de lta bu'i yon gyi nor rdzas ni/ phyogs bcu'i dge
331a7(mdo sde): 'dun dbang ste/ de la logs shig tu mnos shing khyer na/ phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi nor bdag gi sgor khyer na/ bsod nams rnam pa brgyad dang / sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa'i
331a8(mdo sde): rnams dang / mkhan po dang / dge 'dun dang / pha ma dang / nad pa'i rdzas bdag gis spyad kyis ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dang / rab tu ma byung ba'i
331b1(mdo sde): sbyin bdag gi dge 'dun gnyer te/ bsod nams bskyed cing smon lam gsol nas/ dge 'dun gyi nang du song na/ dge bskos la dris te/ de rang go rims gang la bab pa gnyer na phyogs
331b2(mdo sde): bcu'i 'phrul gyi dge 'dun 'thob po/ gud nas dgra bcom pa dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge 'dun lnga bcu gnyer ba bas/ go rim su bab pa'i dge 'dun tha mal ba gcig
331b3(mdo sde): gnyer ba bsod nams che'o// de las dge 'dun gzhan gnyer ba ni/ mur 'dug ngan pa'i cho so// sangs rgyas 'dun la ni gud na/ gnyer ba'i chos med do// sri zhu'i lam dang
331b4(mdo sde): 'gal bas/ gud nas dge 'dun gnyer ba ni ltung banga'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu/ ngan sems spyad de/ gso ba'i khyi'i phyir/ phos mos kyi g.yem pa mchong ba'i bdag
331b5(mdo sde): dar cing zan byed pa dang / bdag rdung ba/ bdag 'du ba/ phos mos kyi mtshan lta mi lam bzang ngan 'gro la// zhes zer/ log pa'i chos kyi bsngags sgyu ma rang bzor
331b6(mdo sde): zer/ dgra bslab pa'i chos byed/ dug go cog sbyor zhing byed la/ dug rtsi rnam pa brgyad stong byed de sbrul dug/ gser dngul ma btul ba'i dug dang / byad skye ma la sogs pa/ snying rje
331b7(mdo sde): yod med pa lta bu/ ched kar byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed/ bdag gi lus kyis dkon mchog gsum la skur byas te/ gzhan la gnyen sgyu ma smos te/ kha
331b8(mdo sde): ni stong pa 'chad/ las ni yod pa'i las byed/ tha mal pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa'i sman byed cing / mi tshangs par spyod par sbyar te/ ci la yang mi 'jigs shing chags pa med/ dus
332a1(mdo sde): drug tu mchod ston byed pa'i nyi ma dang / lo gcig la zla ba gsum gsum mchod rten rtag tu byed pa'i tshe/ sems can gsod/ rkun po dang chom po byed cing / mchod
332a2(mdo sde): ston gyi tshul khrims bshig pa ni ltung ba'o// tshul khrims 'di bcu bslabs la/ rtag par gzungasu gzung ba'i rig so// khrims bzung ba'i le'u gyi nang nas kyang rgya cher mngon par
332a3(mdo sde): bshadado// sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bu/ sangs rgyas 'das pa'i phyin/ ngan pa'i dus la mur 'dug dang / mi ngan pa'o cog dang / rkun po chen po chen po sangs
332a4(mdo sde): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' pha ma dang / mtshung / das pa'i gzugs 'tsheng ba mthong ngam/ chos dang tshu/ la khrims kyi yi ge 'tshong ba mthong ngam/ dge slong dang / 
332a5(mdo sde): dge slong ma 'tsheng ngam/ gcig tu sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'tshong ba dang / la la zhig snying rje'i las la mngags pa'i 'brang nas/ bran po bran mor
332a6(mdo sde): byas pa zhig/ byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu mthong na byams pa'i sems skye do// thabs kyi ra mda' dang skyabs byas te/ gnas gnas na mgo do cog kyang / slar slob cing ston cig/ 
332a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / chos dang / tshul khrims kyi yi ge thams cad nor yod na/ nor gyis lus shig de ltar ma
332a8(mdo sde): blus na ltung ba'o// sangs kyi bu/ 'chang du mi gnang ba la mtshon cha dang / mda' gzhu 'chang ba dang / tshong spogs byed pa dang / srang dang bre chung 'chang ba dang / rtsa lag snyems shing mi
332b1(mdo sde): gzhan la nor len pa dang / sems la phrag dog byed de/ ba log po bcings grags byas pa dang / ngos so don du yod pa zhig btang khyi la dang sel gyi dang khyi dang phag dang / bya 'chang zhig gsor
332b2(mdo sde): mi rung ngo // de lta bu che dkar gson ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed de/ phos mos la sogs pa 'thab bo cog la lta ba dmag gi g.yul dang / dgra chom po byed pa la sogs
332b3(mdo sde): pa las bltar mi rung ngo // yang gcig tu dung 'bud pa dang / rnga gling dang / gyi ma shir dang / jeng dang / gling bu dang / kong he'u dang / glu len pa dang / rol mo'i sgra la mnyan tu mi rung ngo // 
332b4(mdo sde): cho rdo dang / mig mangs dang / par rtsig gi rtsed mo dang / ra' dri lug dmag gi rtsed mo dang / pho long rdob pa dang / rdo 'phe na gyis rtse ba dang / bum bu la bde bu 'phen pa dang / khras byed
332b5(mdo sde): pa dang me long 'brud pa byar mi rung // rtsa ci tsha'u dang / rgya cang da nga/ khor bu kha ru ba dang / mi'i thod pa dang / de rnams la mo ga/ rab tu mi rung ngo // rkun po'i than gyi pho nya la sogs pa gcig
332b6(mdo sde): kyang byar mi rung ngo // de ltar ched kar byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu tshul khrims thub par gzung ba'i rim gro byas na/ 'gro nyal 'dug langs dang / nyin mtshan dus drug tu tshul
332b7(mdo sde): khrims kha ton klogs na/ rdo rje dang mtshungs so// rkyal pa thogs pa mtsho chen po rgal ba dang mtshung so// gcig tu na dge slong rtsas bcings pa dang mtshungs te/ theg pa chen po la
332b8(mdo sde): dge zhing yid ches pa'i sems rtag par bskyed la bdag gis shes par bsam pa nga ni/ da dung sangs rgya su ma phyin pa'i sangs rgyaso// sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams ni sangs rgya su phyin
333a1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgya so snyam du byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ bar mi chad par sems la bsams la/ de la skad cig gcig theg pa chung ngu gnyis dang / mur 'dug la sems
333a2(mdo sde): kyis bsam ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu/ rtag par smon lam thams cad gsol la/ pha ma dang mkhan po dang / dge 'dun dang / dkon mchog gsum la sri zhu che zhing yid dang mi 'gal
333a3(mdo sde): bar smon/ rtag par mkhan po mkhas pa dang / tshangs par spyod du mtshungs pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad de/ rtag par bdag theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang khrims dang / g.yo zhing
333a4(mdo sde): phyogs pa bcu dang / chos rdo rje dang / mtshungs pa bcu dang / das bcu la sogs pa bdag bye zhing shes la/ chos bzhi ngan du lus byed par smon to// sangs rgyas kyi bu tshul khrims/ 
333a5(mdo sde): bzung la/ sran thub par bya bar bya ba ni bskyed cing gso gso kha bcu dang lus dang srog kyang bor te/ sems la sem/ sa dpa'i bar mi bcad par sems pas mo// de la byang
333a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' thams cad 'di lta bu'i smon lam ma bskyed na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu smon lam chen po bcu smon pa'i 'og tu/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims gzungasu bzung ste/ 
333a7(mdo sde): smon lam 'di bzhin du gang po// bdag gi lus 'di me chen po'i chen po tshig kyang rung / khung zab mo dang ral gri ri la song yang rung ste/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi dam pa'i chos kyi
333a8(mdo sde): yi ge dang / tshul khrims mthar mi zhig pa dang / nam du yang mi zhig par bud med thams cad la sogs pa/ mi byed par smon to// gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// lcags bsregs pa'i
333b1(mdo sde): dra ba dang de lta bu rgya mo rim pa stong gis bskor te/ lus dkris kyang thar yun tu tshul khrims dral ba'i lus kyis/ dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi gos thams cad mi bgo bar smon to// yang gcig tu/ 
333b2(mdo sde): smon lam 'di ltar smon to// kha 'di'i nang du lcags kyi thu lum bsregs pa dang / me chu bzhin du bab ste 'ong ba la bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du lon kyang tshul khrims bshig pa'i khas
333b3(mdo sde): da pa'i sbyin bdag gis zas thams cad mi za bar smon to// / yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// lus 'di me chen pos bsregs lcags kyi dra ba dang / lcags bsregs pa ni
333b4(mdo sde): tsha ba'i steng du bsnyal kyang tshul khrims dral ba'i lus kyis/ dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi khri'o cog gi steng du mi 'dug pa dar smon to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di skal pa gcig
333b5(mdo sde): gnyis kyi bar du/ mdung rtse kha gsum pa sum brgyas gtsu gas kyang rung ste/ mthar tshul khrims bshig pa'i lu sa kyis/ dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi rtsi sman thams cad mi
333b6(mdo sde): za bar smon to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// lus 'di bskal pa stong gi bar du lcags kyi zangs po che tsha ba'i nang du bcug kyang rung ste/ mthar tshul khrims 'di 'dul ba'i
333b7(mdo sde): lus kyis/ dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi khang khyim mo cog dang / ldum ra dang / skyed shing dang / zhing gi steng du mi 'dug par smon to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// lus 'di mgo
333b8(mdo sde): nas rkang pa'i bar du lcags kyi gtun pas rdungs te/ rdul phra mo bzhin du song yang / khrims dral ba'i lus sems yid ches pa'i sbyin bdag gis 'grus shing gus par phyag mi
334a1(mdo sde): 'tshal bar smon to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// stong phrag brgya'i lcags bsregs pa'i ral gri dang / mdung rtses mig gnyis brus shing gcags kyang
334a2(mdo sde): tshul khrims bshig pa'i sems kyis/ pha log kyi kha dog bzang po la mi lta bar smon to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// yang gcig kyi spring bu stong phrag brgyas bskal pa
334a3(mdo sde): gcig gnyis kyi bar du lus kyi chub dang / rna ba'i rtsa bar bzugs kyang / tha mar khrims dral ba'i sems kyis/ rol mo snyan pa la mi nyan par smon to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di lta bur smon to// 
334a4(mdo sde): bskal pa stong phrag brgya'i bar du ral gris sna bcad cing gzhogs kyang / khrims dral ba'i sems kyis spos cig ral mi snom par smon to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar
334a5(mdo sde): smon to// bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du lce ral gris bcadagatubs kyang khrims dral ba'i sems kyis/ mtshon ga gi kha zas gtsang ma'o cog la mi bza' bar smon to// 
334a6(mdo sde): gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// sta ri rnon pos lus bcad gtubs kyang mthar khrims dral ba'i sems kyis reg pa'i bzang po la mi bskam mi chags par smon to// yang gcig
334a7(mdo sde): tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// sems can no cog sangs rgya su yod par smon to// byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta bu'i smon lam ma bskyed na ltung ba'o// sangs kyi bu rtag par dus gnyis sbyangs
334a8(mdo sde): pa'i yon+dan pa dgun dang / dbyar bsam gtan du 'jug pa dang / tshul khrimasu 'jug pa so shing dang / sran phye dang chos gos gsum dang / ril ba dang / lhung bzed dang / gtong ba dang / gsol
334b1(mdo sde): byed dang / khog por dang / chu tshags dang / lag byis dang / gri dang / gtsug shing / gtsug bstan dang / smang tsher dang / tha gu'i khri dang / dar ma dang / khrims dang / sangs rgyas kyi bu sbyangs par
334b2(mdo sde): yon+tan spyad pa'i cha grong rgyu ba'i tshe/ 'gro zhing 'ongs na/ rgyang grags brgya stong du 'gro na/ yo byad bco brgyad rtag par lus dang mi 'bral te/ sbyangs pa'i yon+tan pa ni dpyid zla rab tshes bco lnga
334b3(mdo sde): nas dpyid zla tha chungs chos bco lnga'i bar du'o// ston zla 'bring po ches bco lnga nas/ dgun zla ra ba nya'i bar du dus gnyi su yo byad bco brgyad lus dang mi 'bral/ dper bya'i 'dab ma
334b4(mdo sde): dang 'dra'o// de ste gso sbyin gyi nyi ma la gsar du slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams zla ba phyed phyed cing / kha ton du phas pham pa bcu dang / ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa
334b5(mdo sde): brgyad kyi kha don du lhogs shig/ de ste khrims klogs pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas thams cad byang chub sem sa dpa' thams cad kyi gzugs kyi spyan sngar gzugs
334b6(mdo sde): dang gzugs snyan gyi spyan sngar mi gcig gis kha ton klags la/ gcig gis 'thol tshangs bya ste/ gcig gam gnyis sam gang yang rung ste/ stong brgya de yang mi gcig gis
334b7(mdo sde): kha ton klog go// kha ton klog pa ni sa mthon po la 'dug la/ nyan pa ni dma' ba la 'dug go// so so nas chos gos tshal bu dgu pa dang / lnga pa dang / bdun pa dgos te/ tshul du
334b8(mdo sde): 'jug pa ni gcig na sa gcig tu chos bzhin du'o// sbyangs pa'i yon+ta na spyod pa'i tshe/ bgegs yod cing mi bde ba'i nang du ma 'gro shig/ yul gyi bgegs dang / rgyal po mi srun pa dang / sa
335a1(mdo sde): / mthon dman dang / rtsi shing zab mo dang / dbyar seng ge dang / stag dang / sbyang ki dang / chu ste rlung gi bgegs dang / rkun po chom po dang / sbrul gdug pa'i lam la sogs te/ 
335a2(mdo sde): bgegs yod do cog thams cad du sbyangs pa'i yon+tan pa 'gror mi rung ngo // de la chad kar song na ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu chos 'di bzhin du rim pas 'khod cig/ tshul khrims sngar
335a3(mdo sde): nos pa ni sngar 'dug shig/ tshul khrims phyis nos pa ni phyis nas 'dug zhig/ rgan gzhon mi blta/ dge slong pho dang / dge slong mo dang / ya rabs dang / btsun pa dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu/ 
335a4(mdo sde): dang nyung grub dang / bran phos mos la sogs pa/ tshul khrims nos pa ni sngar 'dug shig/ phyis nos pa ni phyis go rims bzhin du 'dag shig/ mur 'dug ngan pa
335a5(mdo sde): dang mi glen pa bzhin du rgan yang rung / gzhon yang rung / snga med phyi med pa'i go rims med pa ni/ g.yung po bra na gyi chos song sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi nang ni/ snga ma ni steng
335a6(mdo sde): du 'dug/ phyi ma ni 'og du 'dugo/ byang chub sems dpa' ni chos bzhin du go rim su ma 'khod na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par sems cano cog bstan cing bcos te/ dge 'dun
335a7(mdo sde): gyi khang khyim byed cing ri dang / tshal dang / rab dang / zhing la sangs rgyas kyi rten gyi khang pa byas la dbyar dgun du tshul dang / bsam gtan du 'jug pa'i gnas dang / gtsang ma'i 'chag sa 'jug
335a8(mdo sde): su bzhugs pa'i rig so// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems can cog gi phyir theg pa chen po'i chos dang / tshul khrims kyi yi ge dkrol bshad na nam na tsha byung ba dang / yul gyi bgegs
335b1(mdo sde): dang dgra'i bgegs dang / pha ma dang / phu nu dang / mkhan po la sogs pa thog ma shi ba'i dus dang / bdun gsum gyi nyi ma dang / bdun bzhi yi nyi ma dang / bdun lnga'i nyi ma dang / bdun bdun gyi
335b2(mdo sde): ma la/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang / tshul khrims bkrol bshad/ mchod ston byas te/ dge ba'i bsod nams thob par gsol shig/ 'gro 'ongs kyang gson po'i mtsho bsod nam
335b3(mdo sde): byed pa la me chen po sa bsregs/ chu chen pos khyer/ rlung nag po chen pos grub bus pa dang / rtsang po dang / mtsho chen po'i dgra'i bgegs la sogs te/ sdig ge cog bgegs dang
335b4(mdo sde): lan gyis na/ mtshams med pa bdun/ bgegs brgya dad lag sgril/ rkang sgril/ ltung dang / lcags dang / lus dbacings drags te/ g.yem zhing khro ba mang po dang / blan zhing
335b5(mdo sde): glen pa mang po dang / na tsha mang po'i dgra zus na/ kun gyis kyang theg pa chen po'i chos kyi yi ge dang / tshul khrim sa kha ton blags te dgrol ba bshad// byang chub sems
335b6(mdo sde): dpa' gsar du slob pa 'di bzhin ma byas na ltung ba'o// tshul khrims 'di dgu brlabs la/ gus par rtag par gzungasu zung shig/ snyoms pa'i chos kyi le'u las kyang rgya che zhing mngon
335b7(mdo sde): bar bshad// sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bus mi la tshul khrims shig sbyin na// bye brag dbye zhing bad ma du mi rung / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon
335b8(mdo sde): po chen po dang / blon po phal dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / pho g.yem mo g.yem dang / gzugs kyi gnas bco brgyad dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnam drug dang // 
336a1(mdo sde): dbang po med pa dang / dbang po rnam gnyis yod pa dang / nyung rum dang / bran pos mos dang / lham srin la sogs te/ thams cad kun khrims mnod du rung // lus la chos kyi gos
336a2(mdo sde): bgo ba rnams ni/ kha dog bsgyur bar ston la/ chos dang 'thun par gyis shig/ kha dog ser po/ sngon po/ nag po// dmar po/ lam gos yan chad kha dog bsgyu ro// lus la gos gso cog chos te/ 
336a3(mdo sde): kha dog bsgyur cig yul lo cog nang na mi'i go su bgo ba la/ dge slong ngo cog gi gos ni/ tha mal ba'i gos dang mi mthu no// thog ma tshul khrims sbyin pa'i tshe/ mkhan pos dri ba khyed tshe 'di la log pa bdun
336a4(mdo sde): gyi sdig byas sam zhes dris shig dang / chos kyi mkhan po byang chub sems dpa' ni/ log pa bdun byas pa la tshul khrims sbyin du mi rung ngo // log pa bdun zhes byas pa ni/ 
336a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi lus la khrag phyung ba dang / pha ma dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon bsad pa dang / lus kyi tshul khrim sa gtsang ma bshig pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba
336a6(mdo sde): pa'i 'phags pa bsad pa yin te/ 'di rnam bdun tshang bar byas te/ bsgribs pa'i tshul la tshul khrims sbyin du mi rungo // gzhan ni thams cad kyang tshul khrims sprin du rung // rab tu byung
336a7(mdo sde): ba'i chos ni rgyal po la yang phyag mi 'tshal/ pha ma la yang phyag mi 'tshal/ gnyen pa rnam pa drug la yang rjes mi bya/ lha ma srin la yang phyag mi 'tshalo// chos kyi mkhan po skad shes pa shig/ 
336a8(mdo sde): rgyang grags stong gi lam nas 'ong ste/ khrims gsol ba zhig yod na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi mkhan pos/ ngan sems dang khro ba'i sems bskyed/ sems can cog la tshul khrims ma
336b1(mdo sde): byin na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu la bstan bcos te/ yid ches pa'i sems g.yo bar bya na/ byang chub sems dpas gzhan tshul khrims bstan pa'i chos kyi mkhan po byas te/ tshul khrims
336b2(mdo sde): mnod du 'ong ba'i mi zhig mthong na/ sngar mkhan po slob dpon gnyer du thong shig/ mkhan po gnyis kyis kyang khyed la bdun gyis bsgribs pa'i sdig yod dam dris shig/ de la yang tshe
336b3(mdo sde): 'di la bdun gyis bsgribs pa'i sdig yod na/ mkhan pos tshul khrims sbyin pa'i mi rig so// bdun gyis bsgribs pa'i sdig med na/ tshul khrims sbyin du rung ngo // la la zhig gis tshul
336b4(mdo sde): khrims bcu gzhig pa yod na/ mthol tshangs byed du chug shig/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpe'i zhal sngar nyin mtshan drug du pham pa bcu dang / ltung ba bzhi bcu
336b5(mdo sde): rtsa brgyad kyi tshul khrims kha don tu glags la/ dus gsu/ ma gyi sangs rgyas la sems thag pa nas phyag 'a/ chel ba'i tshe/ ltas bzang por bya dgo so// de la nyi ma
336b6(mdo sde): bdun dang / bdun gnyis dang / bdun gsum dang / lo gcig tshun chad ltas bzang po mthong dgo so// ltas bzang po zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas gshegs te/ spyi bo la byugs te/ 'od
336b7(mdo sde): mthong ba dang / me tog mthong ba dang / ltas ci yang rung / bzang po mthong na/ mod la sdig 'byed do// de la ltas bzang po med na/ 'thol tshangasu zin kyang mi phan te/ de'i tshe lus kyis ni// 
336b8(mdo sde): tshul khrims mi tho bo// lo dang nyi mas bstan te spobs te byas la/ ltas 'od byung ba bdag mthong na/ tshul khrims mnod du rung ngo // la la zhig gis ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bshig
337a1(mdo sde): ba ni/ 'thol tshangs byas pa'i modo la 'byung ste/ bdun gyis bsgribs pa dang mi tshung so// de bas na tshul khrims ston pa'i mkhan pos/ chos 'di'i nang nas kyang / gcig nas
337a2(mdo sde): gcig nas khrel na mkhan po bya'o// theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang / tshul khrims yeng ba dang / lci ba dang / yin pa dang / ma yin pa'i gzugs dam pa mi shes na/ gzhung gi mchog bden
337a3(mdo sde): ba dang / snga ma'i rang bzhin gyi sa bon dang / da ltar bskyed cing gsol ba'i rang bzhin dang / gtan mo rlag pa'i rang bzhin dang / chos kyi sa bon gyi rang bzhin dang / drang po'i rang bzhin dang / de'i nang nas
337a4(mdo sde): rtog pa dang / dpyod pa'i rang bzhin dang / byi nang gi bsam gtan bcu'i yal ga la sogs te/ chos kyi las bya'o// / cho ga dang / tshul khrims chos kyi yi ge 'di gcig nas
337a5(mdo sde): gcig nas khong du chud de/ byang chub sems dpa' gan ba'i khe dang / ming snyan pa 'dod pa'i slob ma la khe skam pas/ ngan btsal te mi shes pa la sgyu mar chos dang
337a6(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi yi ge kun sheso zhes zer zhing / yon len pa'i bdag la yang bslus shing / brnyas gcig tu na gzhan la yang bslus shing brnyas te/ de lta bus mi la tshul khrims
337a7(mdo sde): byin na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu gso ba'i khe 'dod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims ma mnos pa'i mdun du mur 'dug dang / ma rabs kyi mdun du sangs rgyas stong gi/ 
337a8(mdo sde): tshul khrims chen po 'di ba sha du mi rung ngo // log par lta ba'i mdun du mi rung ngo // rgyal por ma gtogs pa gzhan su'i mdun du yang bsha du mi rung ngo // mi ngan pa rnams kyis/ sangs
337b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi tshul khrims mnos pa ni mi byol song zhes bya'o// gar skyes gar skyes kyang dkon mchog gsum mi mthong zhing / jo shing dang mtshungs/ sems med de/ ming chos log pa zhes
337b2(mdo sde): bya'o// log pa la lta ba'i rnams ni shing du ma dang mtshungaso// byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu ngan pa'i mdun du/ sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi tshul khrims bshad de bstan na ltung ba'o// 
337b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bu sems yid ches te rab tu byung na/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims dam po nos la/ ched kar sems bskyed/ 'phags pa'i tshul khrims gshig na/ sbyin bdag gi cog gi
337b4(mdo sde): yon slang du ni mi rung ngo // gcig tu na rgyal po'i khab kyis daris la yang 'gror mi rung / rgyal po'i chu la yang 'o thung ngu mi rung ste/ 'dre chen po lnga stong gis rtag par de'i
337b5(mdo sde): mdun bcad nas 'dre na re/ dgra chen po khyim dang / mkha dang / yul gyi nang du 'ong so zhes zer te/ de rnams kyi sa kho mor mi de'i rjes phyagaso// 'jig rten na ra yangs
337b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos kyi nang du 'gro'o// zhes zer te/ mig gis mthong du yang mi dga'o// tshul khrims bshig pa ni byol song dang mtshungs/ shing du ma dang mtshungs te/ drang po'i tshul khrims
337b7(mdo sde): gshig na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sems gcig tu rtul te/ rtag par gzungasu bzung ste/ kha ton du yang klog go/ lpags pa bshus te ni shog shog byas khrag phyung bas ni snag
337b8(mdo sde): tshar byas/ rus pa bcag pa ste smig gur byas la/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi yi ge bri'o// shing gi shun pa dang / thod kar la bris te/ rtag par rin po che sna bdun dang / rin med/ 
338a1(mdo sde): pa'i spos dang / me tog la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzeb dang / snod byas te/ nang du chos kyi yi ge tshul khrims kyi glegs bam gzhugo/ de la chos kyi bzhin du
338a2(mdo sde): ri mo ma byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par sems rgya cher bskyed/ yul mkhar dang / khang khyi mo cog tu phyin te/ sems cano cog mthong na/ khyed la sogs pa sen no cog thams
338a3(mdo sde): cad dkon mchog gsum la phyogs shing / tshul khrims bcu nos shig ces bsgo ba'i rig so// byol song gi khams shig na yang sems la bas khar smras te/ khyod ni byol song na/ byang
338a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ni ri lung dbye thang la gnas kyang rung ste/ sems cano cog kun/ byang chub sems dpa'i semadas skye bar byos shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sen ma bstan
338a5(mdo sde): ma bcos na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par bstan/ cing bcos pa'i snying rje chen po bskyed na/ chos byed pa dang / ya rabs la sogs pa sbyin bdag dang / 'du ba mang
338a6(mdo sde): po'i nang du 'greng la/ gos skya bo gyon te chos bshad du mi rung // gos skya bo gon 'du ba mang po'i nang du chos bshad na/ chos kyi mkhan po ni sa mthon por 'dug la/ spos dang me tog gi
338a7(mdo sde): yon gsol to// mtha' bzhir nyan pa'i rnams dma' ba na 'khod la/ gus par nyan to// pha ma la sri zhu mi 'gal bar bya ba dang / slob mas mkhan po la bya ba zhin/ chos la yang
338a8(mdo sde): de bzhin gus par bya'o// bram ze me lha can/ chos byed pa bzhin du gus par byed pa bzhin du gus par bya'o// de bzhin ma byas te chos 'chad pas/ chos bzhin ma bshad na ltung
338b1(mdo sde): ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu kun kyang / the tsom med pa'i yid kyis khrims nos shing / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / slob ma sde bzhi dang / bdag mtho zhing btsan snyems te/ sangs rgyas kyi
338b2(mdo sde): chos dang / tshul khrims bshig la/ nan tur gyi chos byas te/ nga'i slob ma rnam bzhi rab tu byung zhing chos byed par mi ster te bgeg gcig tu na sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / 
338b3(mdo sde): mchod rten 'jug shing / chos dang tshul khrims yi ger 'drir mi ster te/ dkon mchog 'jig cing / de lta bur chen kar chos 'jig pa ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu dge
338b4(mdo sde): ba'i sems spyod la rab tu phyung shig/ lags pa'i ming snyan pa 'dod pa dang / gso ba'i khye'i phyir rgyal po da dang / blon po'i mdun du/ sangs rgyas bdun gyi tshul
338b5(mdo sde): khrims bshad de/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma la byang chub sems dpa'i khrims ma rig par byin te/ slob ma rnams bcings btags na/ seng ge'i lus la srin
338b6(mdo sde): bu 'dug pas/ seng ge bdag gi sha zos pa dang mtshungs te/ phyi'i srin bus sha zos pa ma yin no// de lta bas na sangs rgyas kyi bu mur 'dug dang / bdud kyis chos bshig pa
338b7(mdo sde): ma yin ni/ bdag gis chos gshig pa yin no// sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims nos na/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi rim 'gro bya ba na/ pha mas pha ma bu gcig bu la bsam
338b8(mdo sde): ba dang mtshung so// pha ma la sri zhu bya ba dang 'dra'o// mur 'dug dang / mi ngan ba la ngag ngan pa/ tshig ngan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la skur ba zer na mdung rtse kha
339a1(mdo sde): gsum pa'i mdung rtse gsum brgyas snying la btsugs pa dang / ral gri stong / dbyig bstong khris lus bdegs pa dang mtshungs par bya ste/ bdag gi lus
339a2(mdo sde): bskal brgya'i bar du/ sems can dmyal bar song yang bla'i/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la tshig gcig ngan du zer ba'i skad ni mo thos par smon to// bdag nyid kyis tshul
339a3(mdo sde): khrims bshig pa gzhan la lan lon pa dang / nar gyis zhar gyis tshul khrims bshig par bstan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems mdo// de lta bu byas
339a4(mdo sde): na ltung ba'o// tshul khrims 'di dgu bslabs na sems dgus par gzungasu zung shig/ sangs rgyas kyi bu na dmas tshul khrims yang ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad/ khyed la
339a5(mdo sde): sogs pas rtag par gzung su zung shig/ sngar 'das pi'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i/ sa ni kha ton zin to// da ltar gyi sangs rgyas dang / 
339a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni/ da ltar kha ton byas so// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phyis 'ong ba'i rnams ni/ dade'i khar kha ton byed do// sangs rgyas kyi bu nyon cig
339a7(mdo sde): pas pham pa bcu ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad cig/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyis/ kha ton zi ni da ltar gyi kha ton byas/ phyis kyang kha ton byed de/ nga'ang bzhin du ltar
339a8(mdo sde): nyon byed do// de lta bas na khyed la sogs pas sems can pa la mang po rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen mas/ 
339b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims nos na/ 'grub par kha ton blags la/ bkrol bshad de/ yi ger bris la sangs rgyas kyi rang gyis skal ba rtag par 'dug ste/ khrims kyi glegs
339b2(mdo sde): bam dus gsum gyi bar du tshul bzhin 'bab cing // thogs pa med par byas te/ sems can thams cad bstan cing / bslab pa'i rgyun mi gcod cing / sangs rgyas mthong la
339b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gcig gis gcig la gcad de/ tshe rabs tshe rabs su yang / ngan song dang / bgegs brgyad kyi nang du yang mi ltung zhing / rtag par mi'i lam dang / gnam
339b4(mdo sde): gyi steng du skye'o// ngas da ltar shing 'di'i drung du 'dug/  ste/ sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi chos kyi chos kyi khrims mdo tsam zhig phye ba/ khyed la sogs pa
339b5(mdo sde): snying gcig tu brtul te/ so sor thar pa la bslabs ladaga' zhing gus par gyis shig/ gzugs med pa'i gnam gyi rgyal po'i le'u slob pa'i blon
339b6(mdo sde): 'debs pa'i nang nas/ gcig pu gcig pu nas rgya che zhing mngon par bshad do// de'i tshe slob ma mkhas pa su stong 'dug cing nyan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi kha ton blags pa
339b7(mdo sde): thob nas/ sems thag pa nas spyi bo la khyer te/ dga' gzha' nas rtag par gzung su bzung ngo // de ltar shAkya thub pa sangs rgyas kyi sa yan chad pad mo'i me tog
339b8(mdo sde): gi snod kyi khams kyi rdzogs long spyod pa'i sku'i sems kyi gnas chos kyi sgo mo'i le'u yi nang na/ zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims bshad zin to// stong phrag brgya 'bum gyi thub
340a1(mdo sde): pa yang de bzhin no// dbang po chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal po'i pho brang nas/ 'di'i gtsang ma'i shing drung na 'dug pa bcu'i gnas na/ chos dang tshul khrims
340a2(mdo sde): le'u yang bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bsgo ba bshad kyis mi lang ngo // mang po phal rtag par gzungasu zung la/ kha ton tu lhogs shig/ de'i gzhung bkrol
340a3(mdo sde): bshad pa'i de yin no// stong phrag brgya yang 'bum gyi khams pad+mo'i me tog snod kyi khams rdul phra mo snyed kyi khams kyi thams cad kyi sems kyi snod/ tshul khrims kyi snod grangs
340a4(mdo sde): med pa'i smon lam gyi snod yon dang / sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin 'dug pa'i snod de/ sangs rgyas thams cang grangs med/ chos kyi sgo mo yang bshad zin to// stong
340a5(mdo sde): phrag brgya'i khams kyi nang na/ sems can thams cad kyis gzungasu bzung ste/ dga' zhing gus par bye/ do// sems kyi gnas rgya cher phye ba'i gzungs ni/ sangs
340a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi me tog 'od kyi rgyal po'i yi nang nas bshad do// sangs rgyas bdun gyis tshig gi le'u bshad pa gcig ste/ sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis/ bstan pa'i tshul khrims bshad
340a7(mdo sde): pa/ bzod pa'i dam pas dka' thub zhugs// bzod pa'i dam pas mya ngan 'da'// gzhan la gnod pa de ni byang chub ma yin no// gnyis te spyi tor sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa// mig can
340a8(mdo sde): mi bde yod las byol te 'gro/ mkhas pas 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten na// sdig pa kun kyang rnam par spongs// gsum ste thams cad skyob sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa// / gnod la mi smra mi
340b1(mdo sde): sems te// so sor thar pa bzhin du bsdom// zas kyi chod kyang rig par bya// gnas kyang dben par 'dug par bya// rab tu sems dang ldan pa ni// de ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o// bzhi ste log/ 
340b2(mdo sde): par dang sel sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa// ji ltar bung ba me tog gi/ kha dog gsung la mi gnod par// khu ba blangs te 'bur ba bzhin// de bzhin byang chub grong du spyod// gzhan gyi rnams
340b3(mdo sde): la mi blta bar// gzhan gyis legs par ma byas la'o// bdag rang nyid la ltos/ @#// rgya gar ska du/ tsi t+ya pra dak+Sha ni ga tha/ bod skad du/ mchod rten bskor ba'i tshigs
340b4(mdo sde): su bcad pa// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// shes rab ldan mchog 'jig rten na// chos kyi 'kho dar lo rjes skor pa// shes rab chen po shA ri'i bus// ston pa la
340b5(mdo sde): ni zhu ba zhus// mchod rten bskor ba bgyis pa yi// rnam rnam par smin pa cir 'gyur ba// ston pa chen po 'a jig rten mchog/ rnam par 'dren pas bdag la gsungs
340b6(mdo sde): rdzogs sangs rgyas pa rkang gnyis mchog/ ston pas de la bka' stsal pa// mchod rten dag la phyag byas pa'i// yon+ta na gang yin phyogs tsam bstan// mchod rten bskor ba byas
340b7(mdo sde): pas ni// lha klu de bzhin gnod sbyin dang // sha za de bzhin srid rnams kyis// thams cad du yang mchod par 'gyur// dal 'byor brnyed dka' thob gyur nas// skad cig gcig tsam par// 
340b8(mdo sde): du yang // mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// mi khom brgyad rnam spong bar 'gyur// mcho te/ bskor ba byas pas ni// dran dang ldan zhing blo gros ldan// kha dog ldan zhing 'dzangs pa dang // 
341a1(mdo sde): thams cad du ni mchod par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// lha dang de bzhin mi rnams kyis// tshe rings pa yang de yis 'thob// grags pa chen po'ang thob
341a2(mdo sde): par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// 'dzam bu gling du rus kyi mchog/ cho rigs yongasu dag par yang // blo ldan de ni skye bar 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas na
341a3(mdo sde): kha bzhin dag kyang bzang ba dang // mdog sdug pa dang mkhas pa dang // bde bar gnas pa 'thob par byung mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// phyug cing nor yang mang ba dang // ser sna med
341a4(mdo sde): cing gtong phod dang // sbyin bdag la dga' bar 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// yid du 'ong zhing ba lta na sdug/ mdog bzang mthong na dga' ba dang // long spyod/ 
341a5(mdo sde): chen po tho bar 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// 'du byed stong par mthong na yang // de ni chos la rmo/ ngas mi 'gyur// myur du dga' ba thob par 'gyur// mchod
341a6(mdo sde): rten bskor byas pas ni// rgyal rigs mchog tu skye bar 'gyur// bu smad dang yang ldan pa dang // stobs dang brtson 'grus ldan par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// bram ze che ning / 
341a7(mdo sde): mtho bar skye// tshul khrims ldan zhing thos dang ldan// rig byed gsang sngags ldan par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// khyim bdag che zhing mtho bar skye// drug cing nor
341a8(mdo sde): yang mang ba dang / nor dang 'bru dang ldan par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// 'dzam bu gling gi mnga' bdag rje/ sa steng mtha' dag dbang byed pa'o// chos dang
341b1(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal por 'gyur// mchod rten bskos byas pas ni// rin chen bdun dang ldan pa yi// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur// chos bzhin 'khor lo skor bar byed// mchod rten bskor/ 
341b2(mdo sde): ba byas pas ni// 'di nas 'phos nas mtho ris 'gro/ sangs rgyas bstan la dga' ba dang // rnal 'byor ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// lha yul dag nas 'phos
341b3(mdo sde): na yang // de ni mi yi nang du skye// rmongs pa med par mngal du 'jug/ mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// mngal gyi skyon dang dri ma yis// de la gos par mi 'gyur te// de ni nor bu dag pa bzhin//
